section ‚ÄπData‚Ä∫

text ‚ÄπThis theory defines the data types and notations, and some preliminary results about them.‚Ä∫

theory Data
  imports Main
begin

subsection ‚ÄπFunction notations‚Ä∫

abbreviation Œµ :: "'a ‚áÄ 'b" where
  "Œµ ‚â° Œªx. None"

fun combine :: "('a ‚áÄ 'b) ‚áí ('a  ‚áÄ 'b) ‚áí ('a ‚áÄ 'b)" ("_;;_" 20) where
  "(f ;; g) x = (if g x = None then f x else g x)"

lemma dom_combination_dom_union: "dom (œÑ;;œÑ') = dom œÑ ‚à™ dom œÑ'"
  by auto

subsection ‚ÄπValues, expressions and execution contexts‚Ä∫

datatype const = Unit | F | T

datatype (RID‚á©V: 'r, LID‚á©V: 'l,'v) val = 
  CV const
| Var 'v
| Loc 'l
| Rid 'r
| Lambda 'v "('r,'l,'v) expr"
and (RID‚á©E: 'r, LID‚á©E: 'l,'v) expr =
  VE "('r,'l,'v) val"
| Apply "('r,'l,'v) expr" "('r,'l,'v) expr"
| Ite "('r,'l,'v) expr" "('r,'l,'v) expr" "('r,'l,'v) expr"
| Ref "('r,'l,'v) expr"
| Read "('r,'l,'v) expr"
| Assign "('r,'l,'v) expr" "('r,'l,'v) expr"
| Rfork "('r,'l,'v) expr"
| Rjoin "('r,'l,'v) expr"

datatype (RID‚á©C: 'r, LID‚á©C: 'l,'v) cntxt = 
  Hole ("‚ñ°")
| ApplyL‚á©‚Ñ∞ "('r,'l,'v) cntxt" "('r,'l,'v) expr" 
| ApplyR‚á©‚Ñ∞ "('r,'l,'v) val" "('r,'l,'v) cntxt"
| Ite‚á©‚Ñ∞ "('r,'l,'v) cntxt" "('r,'l,'v) expr" "('r,'l,'v) expr"
| Ref‚á©‚Ñ∞ "('r,'l,'v) cntxt"
| Read‚á©‚Ñ∞ "('r,'l,'v) cntxt"
| AssignL‚á©‚Ñ∞ "('r,'l,'v) cntxt" "('r,'l,'v) expr"
| AssignR‚á©‚Ñ∞ 'l "('r,'l,'v) cntxt"
| Rjoin‚á©‚Ñ∞ "('r,'l,'v) cntxt"

subsection ‚ÄπPlugging and decomposing‚Ä∫

fun plug :: "('r,'l,'v) cntxt ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) expr ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) expr" (infix "‚ä≤" 60) where
  "‚ñ° ‚ä≤ e = e"
| "ApplyL‚á©‚Ñ∞ ‚Ñ∞ e1 ‚ä≤ e = Apply (‚Ñ∞ ‚ä≤ e) e1"
| "ApplyR‚á©‚Ñ∞ val ‚Ñ∞ ‚ä≤ e = Apply (VE val) (‚Ñ∞ ‚ä≤ e)"
| "Ite‚á©‚Ñ∞ ‚Ñ∞ e1 e2 ‚ä≤ e = Ite (‚Ñ∞ ‚ä≤ e) e1 e2"
| "Ref‚á©‚Ñ∞ ‚Ñ∞ ‚ä≤ e = Ref (‚Ñ∞ ‚ä≤ e)"
| "Read‚á©‚Ñ∞ ‚Ñ∞ ‚ä≤ e = Read (‚Ñ∞ ‚ä≤ e)"
| "AssignL‚á©‚Ñ∞ ‚Ñ∞ e1 ‚ä≤ e = Assign (‚Ñ∞ ‚ä≤ e) e1"
| "AssignR‚á©‚Ñ∞ l ‚Ñ∞ ‚ä≤ e = Assign (VE (Loc l)) (‚Ñ∞ ‚ä≤ e)"
| "Rjoin‚á©‚Ñ∞ ‚Ñ∞ ‚ä≤ e = Rjoin (‚Ñ∞ ‚ä≤ e)"

translations
  "‚Ñ∞[x]" ‚áå "‚Ñ∞ ‚ä≤ x"

lemma injective_cntxt [simp]: "(‚Ñ∞[e1] = ‚Ñ∞[e2]) = (e1 = e2)" by (induction ‚Ñ∞) auto

lemma VE_empty_cntxt [simp]: "(VE v = ‚Ñ∞[e]) = (‚Ñ∞ = ‚ñ° ‚àß VE v = e)" by (cases ‚Ñ∞, auto) 

inductive redex :: "('r,'l,'v) expr ‚áí bool" where
  app: "redex (Apply (VE (Lambda x e)) (VE v))"
| iteTrue: "redex (Ite (VE (CV T)) e1 e2)"
| iteFalse: "redex (Ite (VE (CV F)) e1 e2)"
| ref: "redex (Ref (VE v))"
| read: "redex (Read (VE (Loc l)))"
| assign: "redex (Assign (VE (Loc l)) (VE v))"
| rfork: "redex (Rfork e)"
| rjoin: "redex (Rjoin (VE (Rid r)))"

inductive_simps redex_simps [simp]: "redex e"
inductive_cases redexE [elim]: "redex e"

lemma plugged_redex_not_val [simp]: "redex r ‚üπ (‚Ñ∞ ‚ä≤ r) ‚â† (VE t)" by (cases ‚Ñ∞) auto

inductive decompose :: "('r,'l,'v) expr ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) cntxt ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) expr ‚áí bool" where
  top_redex: "redex e ‚üπ decompose e ‚ñ° e"
| lapply: "‚ü¶ ¬¨redex (Apply e‚á©1 e‚á©2); decompose e‚á©1 ‚Ñ∞ r ‚üß ‚üπ decompose (Apply e‚á©1 e‚á©2) (ApplyL‚á©‚Ñ∞ ‚Ñ∞ e‚á©2) r"
| rapply: "‚ü¶ ¬¨redex (Apply (VE v) e); decompose e ‚Ñ∞ r ‚üß ‚üπ decompose (Apply (VE v) e) (ApplyR‚á©‚Ñ∞ v ‚Ñ∞) r"
| ite: "‚ü¶ ¬¨redex (Ite e‚á©1 e‚á©2 e‚á©3); decompose e‚á©1 ‚Ñ∞ r ‚üß ‚üπ decompose (Ite e‚á©1 e‚á©2 e‚á©3) (Ite‚á©‚Ñ∞ ‚Ñ∞ e‚á©2 e‚á©3) r"
| ref: "‚ü¶ ¬¨redex (Ref e); decompose e ‚Ñ∞ r ‚üß ‚üπ decompose (Ref e) (Ref‚á©‚Ñ∞ ‚Ñ∞) r"
| read: "‚ü¶ ¬¨redex (Read e); decompose e ‚Ñ∞ r ‚üß ‚üπ decompose (Read e) (Read‚á©‚Ñ∞ ‚Ñ∞) r"
| lassign: "‚ü¶ ¬¨redex (Assign e‚á©1 e‚á©2); decompose e‚á©1 ‚Ñ∞ r ‚üß ‚üπ decompose (Assign e‚á©1 e‚á©2) (AssignL‚á©‚Ñ∞ ‚Ñ∞ e‚á©2) r"
| rassign: "‚ü¶ ¬¨redex (Assign (VE (Loc l)) e‚á©2); decompose e‚á©2 ‚Ñ∞ r ‚üß ‚üπ decompose (Assign (VE (Loc l)) e‚á©2) (AssignR‚á©‚Ñ∞ l ‚Ñ∞) r"
| rjoin:  "‚ü¶ ¬¨redex (Rjoin e); decompose e ‚Ñ∞ r ‚üß ‚üπ decompose (Rjoin e) (Rjoin‚á©‚Ñ∞ ‚Ñ∞) r"

inductive_cases decomposeE [elim]: "decompose e ‚Ñ∞ r"

lemma plug_decomposition_equivalence: "redex r ‚üπ decompose e ‚Ñ∞ r = (‚Ñ∞[r] = e)"
proof (rule iffI)
  assume x: "decompose e ‚Ñ∞ r"
  show "‚Ñ∞[r] = e" 
  proof (use x in ‚Äπinduct rule: decompose.induct‚Ä∫)
    case (top_redex e)
    thus "‚ñ°[e] = e" by simp
  next
    case (lapply e‚á©1 e‚á©2 ‚Ñ∞ r)
    have "(ApplyL‚á©‚Ñ∞ ‚Ñ∞ e‚á©2) [r] = Apply (‚Ñ∞[r]) e‚á©2" by simp
    also have "... = Apply e‚á©1 e‚á©2" using ‚Äπ‚Ñ∞[r] = e‚á©1‚Ä∫ by simp
    then show ?case by simp
  qed simp+
next
  assume red: "redex r" and  eq: "‚Ñ∞[r] = e"
  have "decompose (‚Ñ∞[r]) ‚Ñ∞ r" by (induct ‚Ñ∞) (use red in ‚Äπauto intro: decompose.intros‚Ä∫)
  thus "decompose e ‚Ñ∞ r" by (simp add: eq)
qed

lemma unique_decomposition: "decompose e ‚Ñ∞‚á©1 r‚á©1 ‚üπ decompose e ‚Ñ∞‚á©2 r‚á©2 ‚üπ ‚Ñ∞‚á©1 = ‚Ñ∞‚á©2 ‚àß r‚á©1 = r‚á©2"
  by (induct arbitrary: ‚Ñ∞‚á©2 rule: decompose.induct) auto

lemma completion_eq [simp]:
  assumes
    red_e: "redex r" and
    red_e': "redex r'"
  shows "(‚Ñ∞[r] = ‚Ñ∞'[r']) = (‚Ñ∞ = ‚Ñ∞' ‚àß r = r')"
proof (rule iffI)
  show "‚Ñ∞[r] = ‚Ñ∞'[r'] ‚üπ ‚Ñ∞ = ‚Ñ∞' ‚àß r = r'"
  proof (rule conjI)
    assume eq: "‚Ñ∞[r] = ‚Ñ∞'[r']"
    have "decompose (‚Ñ∞[r]) ‚Ñ∞ r" using plug_decomposition_equivalence red_e by blast
    hence fst_decomp:"decompose (‚Ñ∞'[r']) ‚Ñ∞ r" by (simp add: eq)
    have snd_decomp: "decompose (‚Ñ∞'[r']) ‚Ñ∞' r'" using plug_decomposition_equivalence red_e' by blast
    show cntxts_eq: "‚Ñ∞ = ‚Ñ∞'" using fst_decomp snd_decomp unique_decomposition by blast
    show "r = r'" using cntxts_eq eq by simp
  qed
qed simp

subsection ‚ÄπStores and states‚Ä∫

type_synonym ('r,'l,'v) store = "'l ‚áÄ ('r,'l,'v) val"
type_synonym ('r,'l,'v) local_state = "('r,'l,'v) store √ó ('r,'l,'v) store √ó ('r,'l,'v) expr"
type_synonym ('r,'l,'v) global_state = "'r ‚áÄ ('r,'l,'v) local_state"

fun doms :: "('r,'l,'v) local_state ‚áí 'l set" where
  "doms (œÉ,œÑ,e) = dom œÉ ‚à™ dom œÑ"

fun LID_snapshot :: "('r,'l,'v) local_state ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) store" ("_‚á©œÉ" 200) where
  "LID_snapshot (œÉ,œÑ,e) = œÉ"

fun LID_local_store :: "('r,'l,'v) local_state ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) store" ("_‚á©œÑ" 200) where
  "LID_local_store (œÉ,œÑ,e) = œÑ"

fun LID_expression :: "('r,'l,'v) local_state ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) expr" ("_‚á©e" 200) where
  "LID_expression (œÉ,œÑ,e) = e"

end

Theory Occurrences

section Occurrences

text ‚ÄπThis theory contains all of the definitions and laws required for reasoning about
  identifiers that occur in the data structures of the concurrent revisions model.‚Ä∫

theory Occurrences
  imports Data
begin

subsection Definitions

subsubsection ‚ÄπRevision identifiers‚Ä∫

definition RID‚á©S :: "('r,'l,'v) store ‚áí 'r set" where
  "RID‚á©S œÉ ‚â° ‚ãÉ (RID‚á©V ` ran œÉ)"

definition RID‚á©L :: "('r,'l,'v) local_state ‚áí 'r set" where
  "RID‚á©L s ‚â° case s of (œÉ, œÑ, e) ‚áí RID‚á©S œÉ ‚à™ RID‚á©S œÑ ‚à™ RID‚á©E e"

definition RID‚á©G :: "('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí 'r set" where
  "RID‚á©G s ‚â° dom s ‚à™ ‚ãÉ (RID‚á©L ` ran s)"

subsubsection ‚ÄπLocation identifiers‚Ä∫

definition LID‚á©S :: "('r,'l,'v) store ‚áí 'l set" where
  "LID‚á©S œÉ ‚â° dom œÉ ‚à™ ‚ãÉ (LID‚á©V ` ran œÉ)"

definition LID‚á©L :: "('r,'l,'v) local_state ‚áí 'l set" where
  "LID‚á©L s ‚â° case s of (œÉ, œÑ, e) ‚áí LID‚á©S œÉ ‚à™ LID‚á©S œÑ ‚à™ LID‚á©E e"

definition LID‚á©G :: "('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí 'l set" where
  "LID‚á©G s ‚â° ‚ãÉ (LID‚á©L ` ran s)"

subsection ‚ÄπInference rules‚Ä∫

subsubsection ‚ÄπIntroduction and elimination rules‚Ä∫

lemma RID‚á©SI [intro]: "œÉ l = Some v ‚üπ r ‚àà RID‚á©V v ‚üπ r ‚àà RID‚á©S œÉ"
  by (auto simp add: RID‚á©S_def ran_def)

lemma RID‚á©SE [elim]: "r ‚àà RID‚á©S œÉ ‚üπ (‚ãÄl v. œÉ l = Some v ‚üπ r ‚àà RID‚á©V v ‚üπ P) ‚üπ P"
  by (auto simp add: RID‚á©S_def ran_def)

lemma RID‚á©LI [intro, consumes 1]:
  assumes "s = (œÉ, œÑ, e)"
  shows
    "r ‚àà RID‚á©S œÉ ‚üπ r ‚àà RID‚á©L s"
    "r ‚àà RID‚á©S œÑ ‚üπ r ‚àà RID‚á©L s"
    "r ‚àà RID‚á©E e ‚üπ r ‚àà RID‚á©L s"
  by (auto simp add: RID‚á©L_def assms)

lemma RID‚á©LE [elim]:
  "‚ü¶ r ‚àà RID‚á©L s; (‚ãÄœÉ œÑ e. s = (œÉ, œÑ, e) ‚üπ (r ‚àà RID‚á©S œÉ ‚üπ P) ‚üπ (r ‚àà RID‚á©S œÑ ‚üπ P) ‚üπ (r ‚àà RID‚á©E e ‚üπ P) ‚üπ P) ‚üπ P ‚üß ‚üπ P" 
  by (cases s) (auto simp add: RID‚á©L_def)

lemma RID‚á©GI [intro]:
  "s r = Some v ‚üπ r ‚àà RID‚á©G s"
  "s r' = Some ls ‚üπ r ‚àà RID‚á©L ls ‚üπ r ‚àà RID‚á©G s"
   apply (simp add: RID‚á©G_def domI)
  by (metis (no_types, lifting) RID‚á©G_def UN_I UnI2 ranI)

lemma RID‚á©GE [elim]:
  assumes
    "r ‚àà RID‚á©G s"
    "r ‚àà dom s ‚üπ P"
    "‚ãÄr' ls. s r' = Some ls ‚üπ r ‚àà RID‚á©L ls ‚üπ P"
  shows P
  using assms by (auto simp add: RID‚á©G_def ran_def)

lemma LID‚á©SI [intro]:
  "œÉ l = Some v ‚üπ l ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ"
  "œÉ l' = Some v ‚üπ l ‚àà LID‚á©V v ‚üπ l ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ"
  by (auto simp add: LID‚á©S_def ran_def)

lemma LID‚á©SE [elim]:
  assumes 
    "l ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ"
    "l ‚àà dom œÉ ‚üπ P"
    "‚ãÄl' v. œÉ l' = Some v ‚üπ l ‚àà LID‚á©V v ‚üπ P"
  shows P
  using assms by (auto simp add: LID‚á©S_def ran_def)

lemma LID‚á©LI [intro]:
  assumes "s = (œÉ, œÑ, e)"
  shows
    "r ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ ‚üπ r ‚àà LID‚á©L s" 
    "r ‚àà LID‚á©S œÑ ‚üπ r ‚àà LID‚á©L s" 
    "r ‚àà LID‚á©E e ‚üπ r ‚àà LID‚á©L s"
  by (auto simp add: LID‚á©L_def assms)

lemma LID‚á©LE [elim]:
  "‚ü¶ l ‚àà LID‚á©L s; (‚ãÄœÉ œÑ e. s = (œÉ, œÑ, e) ‚üπ (l ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ ‚üπ P) ‚üπ (l ‚àà LID‚á©S œÑ ‚üπ P) ‚üπ (l ‚àà LID‚á©E e ‚üπ P) ‚üπ P) ‚üπ P ‚üß ‚üπ P" 
  by (cases s) (auto simp add: LID‚á©L_def)

lemma LID‚á©GI [intro]: "s r = Some ls ‚üπ l ‚àà LID‚á©L ls ‚üπ l ‚àà LID‚á©G s"
  by (auto simp add: LID‚á©G_def LID‚á©L_def ran_def)

lemma LID‚á©GE [elim]: "l ‚àà LID‚á©G s ‚üπ (‚ãÄr ls. s r = Some ls ‚üπ l ‚àà LID‚á©L ls ‚üπ P) ‚üπ P"
  by (auto simp add: LID‚á©G_def ran_def)

subsubsection ‚ÄπDistributive laws‚Ä∫

lemma ID_distr_completion [simp]: 
  "RID‚á©E (‚Ñ∞[e]) = RID‚á©C ‚Ñ∞ ‚à™ RID‚á©E e"
  "LID‚á©E (‚Ñ∞[e]) = LID‚á©C ‚Ñ∞ ‚à™ LID‚á©E e"
  by (induct rule: plug.induct) auto

lemma ID_restricted_store_subset_store: 
  "RID‚á©S (œÉ(l := None)) ‚äÜ RID‚á©S œÉ"
  "LID‚á©S (œÉ(l := None)) ‚äÜ LID‚á©S œÉ"
proof -
  show "RID‚á©S (œÉ(l := None)) ‚äÜ RID‚á©S œÉ"
  proof (rule subsetI)
    fix r
    assume "r ‚àà RID‚á©S (œÉ(l := None))"
    then obtain l' v where "(œÉ(l := None)) l' = Some v" and r_v: "r ‚àà RID‚á©V v" by blast
    have "l' ‚â† l" using ‚Äπ(œÉ(l := None)) l' = Some v‚Ä∫ by auto
    hence "œÉ l' = Some v" using ‚Äπ(œÉ(l := None)) l' = Some v‚Ä∫ by auto
    thus "r ‚àà RID‚á©S œÉ" using r_v by blast
  qed
next
  show "LID‚á©S (œÉ(l := None)) ‚äÜ LID‚á©S œÉ"
  proof (rule subsetI)
    fix l'
    assume "l' ‚àà LID‚á©S (œÉ(l := None))"
    hence "l' ‚àà dom (œÉ(l := None)) ‚à® (‚àÉl'' v. (œÉ(l := None)) l'' = Some v ‚àß l' ‚àà LID‚á©V v)" by blast
    thus "l' ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ"
    proof (rule disjE)
      assume "l' ‚àà dom (œÉ(l := None))"
      thus "l' ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ" by auto
    next
      assume "‚àÉl'' v. (œÉ(l := None)) l'' = Some v ‚àß l' ‚àà LID‚á©V v"
      then obtain l'' v where "(œÉ(l := None)) l'' = Some v" and l'_in_v: "l' ‚àà LID‚á©V v" by blast
      hence "œÉ l'' = Some v" by (cases "l = l''", auto)
      thus "l' ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ" using l'_in_v by blast
    qed
  qed
qed

lemma in_restricted_store_in_unrestricted_store [intro]: 
  "r ‚àà RID‚á©S (œÉ(l := None)) ‚üπ r ‚àà RID‚á©S œÉ"
  "l' ‚àà LID‚á©S (œÉ(l := None)) ‚üπ l' ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ" 
  by (meson contra_subsetD ID_restricted_store_subset_store)+

lemma in_restricted_store_in_updated_store [intro]: 
  "r ‚àà RID‚á©S (œÉ(l := None)) ‚üπ r ‚àà RID‚á©S (œÉ(l ‚Ü¶ v))" 
  "l' ‚àà LID‚á©S (œÉ(l := None)) ‚üπ l' ‚àà LID‚á©S (œÉ(l ‚Ü¶ v))"
proof -
  assume "r ‚àà RID‚á©S (œÉ(l := None))"
  hence "r ‚àà RID‚á©S (œÉ |` (- {l}))" by (simp add: restrict_complement_singleton_eq)
  hence "r ‚àà RID‚á©S (œÉ(l ‚Ü¶ v) |` (- {l}))" by simp
  hence "r ‚àà RID‚á©S (œÉ(l := Some v, l := None))" by (simp add: restrict_complement_singleton_eq)
  thus "r ‚àà RID‚á©S (œÉ(l ‚Ü¶ v))" by blast
next
  assume "l' ‚àà LID‚á©S (œÉ(l := None))"
  hence "l' ‚àà LID‚á©S (œÉ |` (- {l}))" by (simp add: restrict_complement_singleton_eq)
  hence "l' ‚àà LID‚á©S (œÉ(l ‚Ü¶ v) |` (- {l}))" by simp
  hence "l' ‚àà LID‚á©S (œÉ(l := Some v, l := None))" by (simp add: restrict_complement_singleton_eq)
  thus "l' ‚àà LID‚á©S (œÉ(l ‚Ü¶ v))" by blast
qed

lemma ID_distr_store [simp]:
  "RID‚á©S (œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v)) = RID‚á©S (œÑ(l := None)) ‚à™ RID‚á©V v"
  "LID‚á©S (œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v)) = insert l (LID‚á©S (œÑ(l := None)) ‚à™ LID‚á©V v)"
proof -
  show "RID‚á©S (œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v)) = RID‚á©S (œÑ(l := None)) ‚à™ RID‚á©V v"
  proof (rule set_eqI, rule iffI)
    fix r
    assume "r ‚àà RID‚á©S (œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v))"
    then obtain l' v' where "(œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v)) l' = Some v'" "r ‚àà RID‚á©V v'" by blast
    thus "r ‚àà RID‚á©S (œÑ(l := None)) ‚à™ RID‚á©V v" by (cases "l' = l") auto
  qed auto
next
  show "LID‚á©S (œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v)) = insert l (LID‚á©S (œÑ(l := None)) ‚à™ LID‚á©V v)"
  proof (rule set_eqI, rule iffI)
    fix l'
    assume "l' ‚àà LID‚á©S (œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v))"
    hence "l' ‚àà dom (œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v)) ‚à® (‚àÉl'' v'. (œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v)) l'' = Some v' ‚àß l' ‚àà LID‚á©V v')" by blast
    thus "l' ‚àà insert l (LID‚á©S (œÑ(l := None)) ‚à™ LID‚á©V v)"
    proof (rule disjE)
      assume "l' ‚àà dom (œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v))"
      thus "l' ‚àà insert l (LID‚á©S (œÑ(l := None)) ‚à™ LID‚á©V v)" by (cases "l' = l") auto
    next
      assume "‚àÉl'' v'. (œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v)) l'' = Some v' ‚àß l' ‚àà LID‚á©V v'"
      then obtain l'' v' where "(œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v)) l'' = Some v'" "l' ‚àà LID‚á©V v'" by blast
      thus "l' ‚àà insert l (LID‚á©S (œÑ(l := None)) ‚à™ LID‚á©V v)" by (cases "l = l''") auto
    qed
  qed auto
qed

lemma ID_distr_local [simp]: 
  "LID‚á©L (œÉ,œÑ,e) = LID‚á©S œÉ ‚à™ LID‚á©S œÑ ‚à™ LID‚á©E e"
  "RID‚á©L (œÉ,œÑ,e) = RID‚á©S œÉ ‚à™ RID‚á©S œÑ ‚à™ RID‚á©E e"
  by (simp add: LID‚á©L_def RID‚á©L_def)+

lemma ID_restricted_global_subset_unrestricted:
  "LID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚äÜ LID‚á©G s"
  "RID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚äÜ RID‚á©G s"
proof -
  show "LID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚äÜ LID‚á©G s"
  proof (rule subsetI)
    fix l
    assume "l ‚àà LID‚á©G (s(r := None))"
    then obtain r'' ls where "(s(r := None)) r'' = Some ls" and l_in_ls: "l ‚àà LID‚á©L ls" by blast
    have "r'' ‚â† r " using ‚Äπ(s(r := None)) r'' = Some ls‚Ä∫ by auto
    hence "s r'' = Some ls" using ‚Äπ(s(r := None)) r'' = Some ls‚Ä∫ by auto
    thus "l ‚àà LID‚á©G s" using l_in_ls by blast
  qed
next
  show "RID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚äÜ RID‚á©G s"
  proof (rule subsetI)
    fix r'
    assume "r' ‚àà RID‚á©G (s(r := None))"
    hence "r' ‚àà dom (s(r := None)) ‚à® (‚àÉr'' ls. (s(r := None)) r'' = Some ls ‚àß r' ‚àà RID‚á©L ls)" by blast
    thus "r' ‚àà RID‚á©G s"
    proof (rule disjE)
      assume "‚àÉr'' ls. (s(r := None)) r'' = Some ls ‚àß r' ‚àà RID‚á©L ls"
      then obtain r'' ls where "(s(r := None)) r'' = Some ls" and r'_in_ls: "r' ‚àà RID‚á©L ls" by blast
      have neq: "r'' ‚â† r" using ‚Äπ(s(r := None)) r'' = Some ls‚Ä∫ by auto
      hence "s r'' = Some ls" using ‚Äπ(s(r := None)) r'' = Some ls‚Ä∫ by auto
      thus "r' ‚àà RID‚á©G s" using r'_in_ls by blast
    qed auto
  qed
qed

lemma in_restricted_global_in_unrestricted_global [intro]: 
  "r' ‚àà RID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚üπ r' ‚àà RID‚á©G s"
  "l ‚àà LID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚üπ l ‚àà LID‚á©G s"
  by (simp add: ID_restricted_global_subset_unrestricted rev_subsetD)+

lemma in_restricted_global_in_updated_global [intro]: 
  "r' ‚àà RID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚üπ r' ‚àà RID‚á©G (s(r ‚Ü¶ ls))" 
  "l ‚àà LID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚üπ l ‚àà LID‚á©G (s(r ‚Ü¶ ls))"
proof -
  assume "r' ‚àà RID‚á©G (s(r := None))"
  hence "r' ‚àà RID‚á©G (s |` (- {r}))" by (simp add: restrict_complement_singleton_eq)
  hence "r' ‚àà RID‚á©G (s(r ‚Ü¶ ls) |` (- {r}))" by simp
  hence "r' ‚àà RID‚á©G (s(r := Some ls, r := None))" by (simp add: restrict_complement_singleton_eq)
  thus "r' ‚àà RID‚á©G (s(r ‚Ü¶ ls))" by blast
next
  assume "l ‚àà LID‚á©G (s(r := None))"
  hence "l ‚àà LID‚á©G (s |` (- {r}))" by (simp add: restrict_complement_singleton_eq)
  hence "l ‚àà LID‚á©G (s(r ‚Ü¶ ls) |` (- {r}))" by simp
  hence "l ‚àà LID‚á©G (s(r := Some ls, r := None))" by (simp add: restrict_complement_singleton_eq)
  thus "l ‚àà LID‚á©G (s(r ‚Ü¶ ls))" by blast
qed

lemma ID_distr_global [simp]:
  "RID‚á©G (s(r ‚Ü¶ ls)) = insert r (RID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚à™ RID‚á©L ls)"
  "LID‚á©G (s(r ‚Ü¶ ls)) = LID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚à™ LID‚á©L ls"
proof -
  show "LID‚á©G (s(r ‚Ü¶ ls)) = LID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚à™ LID‚á©L ls"
  proof (rule set_eqI)
    fix l
    show "(l ‚àà LID‚á©G (s(r ‚Ü¶ ls))) = (l ‚àà LID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚à™ LID‚á©L ls)"
    proof (rule iffI)
      assume "l ‚àà LID‚á©G (s(r ‚Ü¶ ls))"
      from this obtain r' ls' where "(s(r ‚Ü¶ ls)) r' = Some ls'" "l ‚àà LID‚á©L ls'" by auto
      thus "l ‚àà LID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚à™ LID‚á©L ls" by (cases "r = r'") auto
    qed auto
  qed
  show "RID‚á©G (s(r ‚Ü¶ ls)) = insert r (RID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚à™ RID‚á©L ls)"
  proof (rule set_eqI)
    fix r'
    show "(r' ‚àà RID‚á©G (s(r ‚Ü¶ ls))) = (r' ‚àà insert r (RID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚à™ RID‚á©L ls))"
    proof (rule iffI, clarsimp)
      assume r'_g: "r' ‚àà RID‚á©G (s(r ‚Ü¶ ls))" and neq: "r' ‚â† r" and r'_l: "r' ‚àâ RID‚á©L ls"
      show "r' ‚àà RID‚á©G (s(r := None))"
      proof (rule RID‚á©GE[OF r'_g])
        assume "r' ‚àà dom (s(r ‚Ü¶ ls))"
        thus ?thesis by (simp add: RID‚á©G_def neq)
      next
        fix ls' r''
        assume r'_in_range:"(s(r ‚Ü¶ ls)) r'' = Some ls'" "r' ‚àà RID‚á©L ls'"
        thus ?thesis by (cases "r'' = r") (use neq r'_l in auto)
      qed
    qed auto
  qed
qed

lemma restrictions_inwards [simp]:
  "x ‚â† x' ‚üπ f(x := Some y, x' := None) = (f(x':= None, x := Some y))"
  by (rule fun_upd_twist)

subsubsection ‚ÄπMiscellaneous laws‚Ä∫

lemma ID_combination_subset_union [intro]:
  "RID‚á©S (œÉ;;œÑ) ‚äÜ RID‚á©S œÉ ‚à™ RID‚á©S œÑ"
  "LID‚á©S (œÉ;;œÑ) ‚äÜ LID‚á©S œÉ ‚à™ LID‚á©S œÑ"
proof -
  show "RID‚á©S (œÉ;;œÑ) ‚äÜ RID‚á©S œÉ ‚à™ RID‚á©S œÑ"
  proof (rule subsetI)
    fix r
    assume "r ‚àà RID‚á©S (œÉ;;œÑ)"
    from this obtain l v where "(œÉ;;œÑ) l = Some v" and "r ‚àà RID‚á©V v" by blast
    thus "r ‚àà RID‚á©S œÉ ‚à™ RID‚á©S œÑ" by (cases "l ‚àà dom œÑ") auto
  qed
  show "LID‚á©S (œÉ;;œÑ) ‚äÜ LID‚á©S œÉ ‚à™ LID‚á©S œÑ"
  proof (rule subsetI)
    fix l
    assume "l ‚àà LID‚á©S (œÉ;;œÑ)"
    hence "l ‚àà dom (œÉ;;œÑ) ‚à® (‚àÉl' v. (œÉ;;œÑ) l' = Some v ‚àß l ‚àà LID‚á©V v)" by blast
    thus "l ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ ‚à™ LID‚á©S œÑ"
    proof (rule disjE)
      assume "l ‚àà dom (œÉ;;œÑ)"
      thus "l ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ ‚à™ LID‚á©S œÑ" by (cases "l ‚àà dom œÑ") auto
    next 
      assume "‚àÉl' v. (œÉ;;œÑ) l' = Some v ‚àß l ‚àà LID‚á©V v"
      from this obtain l' v where "(œÉ;;œÑ) l' = Some v" "l ‚àà LID‚á©V v" by blast
      thus "l ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ ‚à™ LID‚á©S œÑ" by (cases "l' ‚àà dom œÑ") auto
    qed
  qed
qed

lemma in_combination_in_component [intro]: 
  "r ‚àà RID‚á©S (œÉ;;œÑ) ‚üπ r ‚àâ RID‚á©S œÉ ‚üπ r ‚àà RID‚á©S œÑ"
  "r ‚àà RID‚á©S (œÉ;;œÑ) ‚üπ r ‚àâ RID‚á©S œÑ ‚üπ r ‚àà RID‚á©S œÉ"
  "l ‚àà LID‚á©S (œÉ;;œÑ) ‚üπ l ‚àâ LID‚á©S œÉ ‚üπ l ‚àà LID‚á©S œÑ"
  "l ‚àà LID‚á©S (œÉ;;œÑ) ‚üπ l ‚àâ LID‚á©S œÑ ‚üπ l ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ"
  by (meson Un_iff ID_combination_subset_union subsetCE)+

lemma in_mapped_in_component_of_combination [intro]:
  assumes 
    maps_to_v: "(œÉ;;œÑ) l = Some v" and
    l'_in_v: "l' ‚àà LID‚á©V v"
  shows
    "l' ‚àâ LID‚á©S œÑ ‚üπ l' ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ"
    "l' ‚àâ LID‚á©S œÉ ‚üπ l' ‚àà LID‚á©S œÑ"
  by (metis LID‚á©SI(2) combine.simps l'_in_v maps_to_v)+

lemma elim_trivial_restriction [simp]: "l ‚àâ LID‚á©S œÑ ‚üπ (œÑ(l := None)) = œÑ" 
  by (simp add: LID‚á©S_def domIff fun_upd_idem)

lemma ID_distr_global_conditional:
  "s r = Some ls ‚üπ RID‚á©G s = insert r (RID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚à™ RID‚á©L ls)"
  "s r = Some ls ‚üπ LID‚á©G s = LID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚à™ LID‚á©L ls"
proof -
  assume "s r = Some ls"
  hence s_as_upd: "s = (s(r ‚Ü¶ ls))" by (simp add: fun_upd_idem)
  show "RID‚á©G s = insert r (RID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚à™ RID‚á©L ls)" by (subst s_as_upd, simp)
  show "LID‚á©G s = LID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚à™ LID‚á©L ls" by (subst s_as_upd, simp)
qed

end

Theory Renaming

section Renaming

text ‚ÄπSimilar to the bound variables of lambda calculus, location and revision identifiers are meaningless
  names. This theory contains all of the definitions and results required for renaming data structures
  and proving renaming-equivalence.‚Ä∫

theory Renaming
  imports Occurrences
begin

subsection Definitions

abbreviation rename_val :: "('r ‚áí 'r) ‚áí ('l ‚áí 'l) ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) val ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) val" ("‚Ñõ‚á©V") where
  "‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v ‚â° map_val Œ± Œ≤ id v"

abbreviation rename_expr :: "('r ‚áí 'r) ‚áí ('l ‚áí 'l) ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) expr ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) expr" ("‚Ñõ‚á©E") where
  "‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e ‚â° map_expr Œ± Œ≤ id e"

abbreviation rename_cntxt :: "('r ‚áí 'r) ‚áí ('l ‚áí 'l) ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) cntxt ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) cntxt" ("‚Ñõ‚á©C") where
  "‚Ñõ‚á©C Œ± Œ≤ ‚Ñ∞ ‚â° map_cntxt Œ± Œ≤ id ‚Ñ∞"

definition is_store_renaming :: "('r ‚áí 'r) ‚áí ('l ‚áí 'l) ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) store ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) store ‚áí bool" where 
  "is_store_renaming Œ± Œ≤ œÉ œÉ' ‚â° ‚àÄl. case œÉ l of None ‚áí œÉ' (Œ≤ l) = None | Some v ‚áí œÉ' (Œ≤ l) = Some (‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v)"

notation Option.bind (infixl "‚§ú" 80)

fun ‚Ñõ‚á©S :: "('r ‚áí 'r) ‚áí ('l ‚áí 'l) ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) store ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) store" where
  "‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ l = œÉ (inv Œ≤ l) ‚§ú (Œªv. Some (‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v))"

lemma ‚Ñõ‚á©S_implements_renaming: "bij Œ≤ ‚üπ is_store_renaming Œ± Œ≤ œÉ (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ)"
proof -
  assume "bij Œ≤"
  hence "inj Œ≤" using bij_def by auto
  thus ?thesis by (auto simp add: is_store_renaming_def option.case_eq_if)
qed

fun ‚Ñõ‚á©L :: "('r ‚áí 'r) ‚áí ('l ‚áí 'l) ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) local_state ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) local_state" where
  "‚Ñõ‚á©L Œ± Œ≤ (œÉ,œÑ,e) = (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ, ‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÑ, ‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e)"

definition is_global_renaming :: "('r ‚áí 'r) ‚áí ('l ‚áí 'l) ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí bool" where 
  "is_global_renaming Œ± Œ≤ s s' ‚â° ‚àÄr. case s r of None ‚áí s' (Œ± r) = None | Some ls ‚áí s' (Œ± r) = Some (‚Ñõ‚á©L Œ± Œ≤ ls)"

fun ‚Ñõ‚á©G :: "('r ‚áí 'r) ‚áí ('l ‚áí 'l) ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state" where
  "‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s r = s (inv Œ± r) ‚§ú (Œªls. Some (‚Ñõ‚á©L Œ± Œ≤ ls))"

lemma ‚Ñõ‚á©G_implements_renaming: "bij Œ± ‚üπ is_global_renaming Œ± Œ≤ s (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s)"
proof -
  assume "bij Œ±"
  hence "inj Œ±" using bij_def by auto
  thus ?thesis by (auto simp add: is_global_renaming_def option.case_eq_if)
qed

subsection ‚ÄπIntroduction rules‚Ä∫

lemma ‚Ñõ‚á©SI [intro]:
  assumes
    bij_Œ≤: "bij Œ≤" and
    none_case: "‚ãÄl. œÉ l = None ‚üπ œÉ' (Œ≤ l) = None" and
    some_case: "‚ãÄl v. œÉ l = Some v ‚üπ œÉ' (Œ≤ l) = Some (‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v)"
  shows
    "‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ = œÉ'"
proof (rule ext, subst ‚Ñõ‚á©S.simps)
  fix l
  show "œÉ (inv Œ≤ l) ‚§ú (Œªv. Some (‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v)) = œÉ' l" (is "?lhs = œÉ' l")
  proof (cases "œÉ (inv Œ≤ l) = None")
    case True
    have lhs_none: "?lhs = None" by (simp add: True)
    have "œÉ' (Œ≤ (inv Œ≤ l)) = None" by (simp add: none_case True)
    hence rhs_none: "œÉ' l = None" by (simp add: bij_Œ≤ bijection.intro bijection.inv_right)
    show ?thesis by (simp add: lhs_none rhs_none)
  next
    case False
    from this obtain v where is_some: "œÉ (inv Œ≤ l) = Some v" by blast
    hence lhs_some: "?lhs = Some (‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v)" by auto
    have "œÉ' (Œ≤ (inv Œ≤ l)) = Some (‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v)" by (simp add: is_some some_case)
    hence rhs_some: "œÉ' l = Some (‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v)" by (simp add: bij_Œ≤ bijection.intro bijection.inv_right)
    then show ?thesis by (simp add: lhs_some)
  qed
qed

lemma ‚Ñõ‚á©GI [intro]: 
  assumes
    bij_Œ±: "bij Œ±" and
    none_case: "‚ãÄr. s r = None ‚üπ s' (Œ± r) = None" and
    some_case: "‚ãÄr œÉ œÑ e. s r = Some (œÉ,œÑ,e) ‚üπ s' (Œ± r) = Some (‚Ñõ‚á©L Œ± Œ≤ (œÉ,œÑ,e))"
  shows
    "‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s = s'"
proof (rule ext, subst ‚Ñõ‚á©G.simps)
  fix r
  show "s (inv Œ± r) ‚§ú (Œªls. Some (‚Ñõ‚á©L Œ± Œ≤ ls)) = s' r" (is "?lhs = s' r")
  proof (cases "s (inv Œ± r) = None")
    case True
    have lhs_none: "?lhs = None" by (simp add: True)
    have "s' (Œ± (inv Œ± r)) = None" by (simp add: none_case True)
    hence rhs_none: "s' r = None" by (simp add: bij_Œ± bijection.intro bijection.inv_right)
    show ?thesis by (simp add: lhs_none rhs_none)
  next
    case False
    from this obtain ls where "s (inv Œ± r) = Some ls" by blast
    from this obtain œÉ œÑ e where is_some: "s (inv Œ± r) = Some (œÉ, œÑ, e)" by (cases ls) blast
    hence lhs_some: "?lhs = Some (‚Ñõ‚á©L Œ± Œ≤ (œÉ, œÑ, e))" by auto
    have "s' (Œ± (inv Œ± r)) = Some (‚Ñõ‚á©L Œ± Œ≤ (œÉ, œÑ, e))" by (simp add: is_some some_case)
    hence rhs_some: "s' r = Some (‚Ñõ‚á©L Œ± Œ≤ (œÉ, œÑ, e))" by (simp add: bij_Œ± bijection.intro bijection.inv_right)
    then show ?thesis by (simp add: lhs_some)
  qed
qed

subsection ‚ÄπRenaming-equivalence‚Ä∫

subsubsection Identity

declare val.map_id [simp]
declare expr.map_id [simp]
declare cntxt.map_id [simp]
lemma ‚Ñõ‚á©S_id [simp]: "‚Ñõ‚á©S id id œÉ = œÉ" by auto
lemma ‚Ñõ‚á©L_id [simp]: "‚Ñõ‚á©L id id ls = ls" by (cases ls) simp
lemma ‚Ñõ‚á©G_id [simp]: "‚Ñõ‚á©G id id s = s" by auto

subsubsection Composition

declare val.map_comp [simp]
declare expr.map_comp [simp]
declare cntxt.map_comp [simp]
lemma ‚Ñõ‚á©S_comp [simp]: "‚ü¶ bij Œ≤; bij Œ≤' ‚üß ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ±' Œ≤' (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ s) = ‚Ñõ‚á©S (Œ±' ‚àò Œ±) (Œ≤' ‚àò Œ≤) s"
  by (auto simp add: o_inv_distrib)
lemma ‚Ñõ‚á©L_comp [simp]: "‚ü¶ bij Œ≤; bij Œ≤' ‚üß ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©L Œ±' Œ≤' (‚Ñõ‚á©L Œ± Œ≤ ls) = ‚Ñõ‚á©L (Œ±' ‚àò Œ±) (Œ≤' ‚àò Œ≤) ls"
  by (cases ls) simp
lemma ‚Ñõ‚á©G_comp [simp]: "‚ü¶ bij Œ±; bij Œ±'; bij Œ≤; bij Œ≤' ‚üß ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ±' Œ≤' (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s) = ‚Ñõ‚á©G (Œ±' ‚àò Œ±) (Œ≤' ‚àò Œ≤) s"
  by (rule ext) (auto simp add: o_inv_distrib)

subsubsection Inverse

lemma ‚Ñõ‚á©V_inv [simp]: "‚ü¶ bij Œ±; bij Œ≤ ‚üß ‚üπ (‚Ñõ‚á©V (inv Œ±) (inv Œ≤) v' = v) = (‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v = v')"
  by (auto simp add: bijection.intro bijection.inv_comp_right bijection.inv_comp_left)
lemma ‚Ñõ‚á©E_inv [simp]: "‚ü¶ bij Œ±; bij Œ≤ ‚üß ‚üπ (‚Ñõ‚á©E (inv Œ±) (inv Œ≤) e' = e) = (‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e = e')"
  by (auto simp add: bijection.intro bijection.inv_comp_right bijection.inv_comp_left)
lemma ‚Ñõ‚á©C_inv [simp]: "‚ü¶ bij Œ±; bij Œ≤ ‚üß ‚üπ (‚Ñõ‚á©C (inv Œ±) (inv Œ≤) ‚Ñ∞' = ‚Ñ∞) = (‚Ñõ‚á©C Œ± Œ≤ ‚Ñ∞ = ‚Ñ∞')"
  by (auto simp add: bijection.intro bijection.inv_comp_right bijection.inv_comp_left)
lemma ‚Ñõ‚á©S_inv [simp]: "‚ü¶ bij Œ±; bij Œ≤ ‚üß ‚üπ (‚Ñõ‚á©S (inv Œ±) (inv Œ≤) œÉ' = œÉ) = (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ = œÉ')"
  by (auto simp add: bij_imp_bij_inv bijection.intro bijection.inv_comp_right bijection.inv_comp_left)
lemma ‚Ñõ‚á©L_inv [simp]: "‚ü¶ bij Œ±; bij Œ≤ ‚üß ‚üπ (‚Ñõ‚á©L (inv Œ±) (inv Œ≤) ls' = ls) = (‚Ñõ‚á©L Œ± Œ≤ ls = ls')"
  by (auto simp add: bij_imp_bij_inv bijection.intro bijection.inv_comp_right bijection.inv_comp_left)
lemma ‚Ñõ‚á©G_inv [simp]: "‚ü¶ bij Œ±; bij Œ≤ ‚üß ‚üπ (‚Ñõ‚á©G (inv Œ±) (inv Œ≤) s' = s) = (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s = s')"
  by (auto simp add: bij_imp_bij_inv bijection.intro bijection.inv_comp_right bijection.inv_comp_left)

subsubsection Equivalence

definition eq_states :: "('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí bool" ("_ ‚âà _" [100, 100]) where
  "s ‚âà s' ‚â° ‚àÉŒ± Œ≤. bij Œ± ‚àß bij Œ≤ ‚àß ‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s = s'"

lemma eq_statesI [intro]:
  "‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s = s' ‚üπ bij Œ± ‚üπ bij Œ≤ ‚üπ s ‚âà s'"
  using eq_states_def by auto

lemma eq_statesE [elim]:
  "s ‚âà s' ‚üπ (‚ãÄŒ± Œ≤. ‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s = s' ‚üπ bij Œ± ‚üπ bij Œ≤ ‚üπ P) ‚üπ P"
  using eq_states_def by blast

lemma Œ±Œ≤_refl: "s ‚âà s" by (rule eq_statesI[of id id s]) auto
 
lemma Œ±Œ≤_trans: "s ‚âà s' ‚üπ s' ‚âà s'' ‚üπ s ‚âà s''"
proof -
  assume "s ‚âà s'"
  from this obtain Œ± Œ≤ where s_s': "bij Œ±" "bij Œ≤" "‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s = s'" by blast
  assume "s' ‚âà s''"
  from this obtain Œ±' Œ≤' where s'_s'': "bij Œ±'" "bij Œ≤'" "‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ±' Œ≤' s' = s''" by blast
  show "s ‚âà s''" by (rule eq_statesI[of "Œ±' ‚àò Œ±" "Œ≤' ‚àò Œ≤"]) (use s_s' s'_s'' in ‚Äπauto simp add: bij_comp‚Ä∫)
qed

lemma Œ±Œ≤_sym: "s ‚âà s' ‚üπ s' ‚âà s"
proof -
  assume "s ‚âà s'"
  from this obtain Œ± Œ≤ where s_s': "bij Œ±" "bij Œ≤" "‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s = s'" by blast
  show "s' ‚âà s" by (rule eq_statesI[of "inv Œ±" "inv Œ≤"]) (use s_s' in ‚Äπauto simp add: bij_imp_bij_inv‚Ä∫)
qed

subsection ‚ÄπDistributive laws‚Ä∫

subsubsection Expression

lemma renaming_distr_completion [simp]:
  "‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ (‚Ñ∞[e]) = ((‚Ñõ‚á©C Œ± Œ≤ ‚Ñ∞)[‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e])"
  by (induct ‚Ñ∞) simp+

subsubsection Store

lemma renaming_distr_combination [simp]: 
  "‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ (œÉ;;œÑ) = (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ;;‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÑ)"
  by (rule ext) auto

lemma renaming_distr_store [simp]:
  "bij Œ≤ ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ (œÉ(l ‚Ü¶ v)) = ‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ(Œ≤ l ‚Ü¶ ‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v)"
  by (auto simp add: bijection.intro bijection.inv_left_eq_iff)

(* distribution law for local follows from the definition *)

subsubsection Global 

lemma renaming_distr_global [simp]:
  "bij Œ± ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ (s(r ‚Ü¶ ls)) = ‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s(Œ± r ‚Ü¶ ‚Ñõ‚á©L Œ± Œ≤ ls)"
  "bij Œ± ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ (s(r := None)) = (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s)(Œ± r := None)"
  by (auto simp add: bijection.intro bijection.inv_left_eq_iff)

subsection ‚ÄπMiscellaneous laws‚Ä∫

lemma rename_empty [simp]:
  "‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ Œµ = Œµ"
  "‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ Œµ = Œµ"
  by auto

subsection Swaps

lemma swap_bij: 
  "bij (id(x := x', x' := x))" (is "bij ?f")
proof (rule bijI)
  show "inj ?f" by (simp add: inj_on_def)
  show "surj ?f"
  proof
    show "UNIV ‚äÜ range (id(x := x', x' := x))"
    proof (rule subsetI)
      fix y
      assume "y ‚àà (UNIV :: 'a set)"
      show "y ‚àà range (id(x := x', x' := x))" by (cases "y = x"; cases "y = x'") auto
    qed
  qed simp
qed

lemma id_trivial_update [simp]: "id(x := x) = id" by auto (* for solving trivial peaks *)

lemma eliminate_renaming_val_expr [simp]:
  fixes
    v :: "('r,'l,'v) val" and
    e :: "('r,'l,'v) expr"
  shows
    "l ‚àâ LID‚á©V v ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± (Œ≤(l := l')) v = ‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v"
    "l ‚àâ LID‚á©E e ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± (Œ≤(l := l')) e = ‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e"
    "r ‚àâ RID‚á©V v ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©V (Œ±(r := r')) Œ≤ v = ‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v"
    "r ‚àâ RID‚á©E e ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©E (Œ±(r := r')) Œ≤ e = ‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e"
proof -
  have "(‚àÄŒ± Œ≤ r r'. r ‚àâ RID‚á©V v ‚ü∂ ‚Ñõ‚á©V (Œ±(r := r')) Œ≤ v = ‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v) ‚àß
    (‚àÄŒ± Œ≤ r r'. r ‚àâ RID‚á©E e ‚ü∂ ‚Ñõ‚á©E (Œ±(r := r')) Œ≤ e = ‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e)"
    by (induct rule: val_expr.induct) simp+
  thus 
    "r ‚àâ RID‚á©V v ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©V (Œ±(r := r')) Œ≤ v = ‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v" 
    "r ‚àâ RID‚á©E e ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©E (Œ±(r := r')) Œ≤ e = ‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e"
    by simp+
  have "(‚àÄŒ± Œ≤ l l'. l ‚àâ LID‚á©V v ‚ü∂ ‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± (Œ≤(l := l')) v = ‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v) ‚àß
    (‚àÄŒ± Œ≤ l l'. l ‚àâ LID‚á©E e ‚ü∂ ‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± (Œ≤(l := l')) e = ‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e)"
    by (induct rule: val_expr.induct) simp+
  thus 
    "l ‚àâ LID‚á©V v ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± (Œ≤(l := l')) v = ‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v" and
    "l ‚àâ LID‚á©E e ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± (Œ≤(l := l')) e = ‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e"
    by simp+
qed

lemma eliminate_renaming_cntxt [simp]:
  "r ‚àâ RID‚á©C ‚Ñ∞ ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©C (Œ±(r := r')) Œ≤ ‚Ñ∞ = ‚Ñõ‚á©C Œ± Œ≤ ‚Ñ∞"
  "l ‚àâ LID‚á©C ‚Ñ∞ ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©C Œ± (Œ≤(l := l')) ‚Ñ∞ = ‚Ñõ‚á©C Œ± Œ≤ ‚Ñ∞"
  by (induct ‚Ñ∞ rule: cntxt.induct) auto

lemma eliminate_swap_val [simp, intro]:
  "r ‚àâ RID‚á©V v ‚üπ r' ‚àâ RID‚á©V v ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©V (id(r := r', r' := r)) id v = v"
  "l ‚àâ LID‚á©V v ‚üπ l' ‚àâ LID‚á©V v ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©V id (id(l := l', l' := l)) v = v"
  by simp+

lemma eliminate_swap_expr [simp, intro]:
  "r ‚àâ RID‚á©E e ‚üπ r' ‚àâ RID‚á©E e ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©E (id(r := r', r' := r)) id e = e"
  "l ‚àâ LID‚á©E e ‚üπ l' ‚àâ LID‚á©E e ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©E id (id(l := l', l' := l)) e = e"
  by simp+

lemma eliminate_swap_cntxt [simp, intro]:
  "r ‚àâ RID‚á©C ‚Ñ∞ ‚üπ r' ‚àâ RID‚á©C ‚Ñ∞ ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©C (id(r := r', r' := r)) id ‚Ñ∞ = ‚Ñ∞"
  "l ‚àâ LID‚á©C ‚Ñ∞ ‚üπ l' ‚àâ LID‚á©C ‚Ñ∞ ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©C id (id(l := l', l' := l)) ‚Ñ∞ = ‚Ñ∞"
  by simp+

lemma eliminate_swap_store_rid [simp, intro]:
  "r ‚àâ RID‚á©S œÉ ‚üπ r' ‚àâ RID‚á©S œÉ ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©S (id(r := r', r' := r)) id œÉ = œÉ"
  by (rule ‚Ñõ‚á©SI) (auto simp add: swap_bij RID‚á©S_def domIff ranI)

lemma eliminate_swap_store_lid [simp, intro]:
  "l ‚àâ LID‚á©S œÉ ‚üπ l' ‚àâ LID‚á©S œÉ ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©S id (id(l := l', l' := l)) œÉ = œÉ"
  by (rule ‚Ñõ‚á©SI) (auto simp add: swap_bij LID‚á©S_def domIff ranI)

lemma eliminate_swap_global_rid [simp, intro]:
  "r ‚àâ RID‚á©G s ‚üπ r' ‚àâ RID‚á©G s ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©G (id(r := r', r' := r)) id s = s"
  by (rule ‚Ñõ‚á©GI[OF swap_bij], ((rule sym, auto)[1])+)

lemma eliminate_swap_global_lid [simp, intro]:
  "l ‚àâ LID‚á©G s ‚üπ l' ‚àâ LID‚á©G s ‚üπ ‚Ñõ‚á©G id (id(l := l', l' := l)) s = s"
  by (rule ‚Ñõ‚á©GI) (auto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional)

end

Theory Substitution

section Substitution

text ‚ÄπThis theory introduces the substitution operation using a locale, and provides two models.‚Ä∫

theory Substitution
  imports Renaming
begin

subsection Definition

locale substitution =
  fixes subst :: "('r,'l,'v) expr ‚áí 'v ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) expr ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) expr"
  assumes 
    renaming_distr_subst: "‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ (subst e x e') = subst (‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e) x (‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e')" and (* needed in mimicking *)
    subst_introduces_no_rids: "RID‚á©E (subst e x e') ‚äÜ RID‚á©E e ‚à™ RID‚á©E e'" and
    subst_introduces_no_lids: "LID‚á©E (subst e x e') ‚äÜ LID‚á©E e ‚à™ LID‚á©E e'"
begin

lemma rid_substE [dest]: "r ‚àà RID‚á©E (subst (VE v) x e) ‚üπ r ‚àâ RID‚á©E e ‚üπ r ‚àà RID‚á©V v"
  using subst_introduces_no_rids by fastforce

lemma lid_substE [dest]: "l ‚àà LID‚á©E (subst (VE v) x e) ‚üπ l ‚àâ LID‚á©E e ‚üπ l ‚àà LID‚á©V v"
  using subst_introduces_no_lids by fastforce

end (* substitution locale *)

subsection ‚ÄπTrivial model‚Ä∫

fun constant_function :: "('r,'l,'v) expr ‚áí 'v ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) expr ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) expr" where 
  "constant_function e x e' = VE (CV Unit)"

lemma constant_function_models_substitution: 
  "substitution constant_function" by (auto simp add: substitution_def)

subsection ‚ÄπExample model‚Ä∫

subsubsection Preliminaries

notation set3_val ("ùí±‚á©V")
notation set3_expr ("ùí±‚á©E")

abbreviation rename_vars_val :: "('v ‚áí 'v) ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) val ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) val" ("‚Ñõùí±‚á©V") where
  "‚Ñõùí±‚á©V Œ∂ ‚â° map_val id id Œ∂"

abbreviation rename_vars_expr :: "('v ‚áí 'v) ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) expr ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) expr" ("‚Ñõùí±‚á©E") where
  "‚Ñõùí±‚á©E Œ∂ ‚â° map_expr id id Œ∂"

lemma var_renaming_preserves_size: (* for termination proof *)
  fixes 
    v :: "('r,'l,'v) val" and
    e :: "('r,'l,'v) expr" and
    Œ± :: "'r ‚áí 'r'" and
    Œ≤ :: "'l ‚áí 'l'" and
    Œ∂ :: "'v ‚áí 'v'"
  shows
  "size (map_val Œ± Œ≤ Œ∂ v) = size v"
  "size (map_expr Œ± Œ≤ Œ∂ e) = size e"
proof -
  have "(‚àÄ(Œ± :: 'r ‚áí 'r') (Œ≤ :: 'l ‚áí 'l') (Œ∂ :: 'v ‚áí 'v'). size (map_val Œ± Œ≤ Œ∂ v) = size v) ‚àß 
        (‚àÄ(Œ± :: 'r ‚áí 'r') (Œ≤ :: 'l ‚áí 'l') (Œ∂ :: 'v ‚áí 'v'). size (map_expr Œ± Œ≤ Œ∂ e) = size e)"
    by (induct rule: val_expr.induct) auto
  thus 
    "size (map_val Œ± Œ≤ Œ∂ v) = size v" 
    "size (map_expr Œ± Œ≤ Œ∂ e) = size e" 
    by auto
qed

subsubsection Definition

function
  nat_subst‚á©V :: "('r,'l,nat) expr ‚áí nat ‚áí ('r,'l,nat) val ‚áí ('r,'l,nat) expr" and
  nat_subst‚á©E :: "('r,'l,nat) expr ‚áí nat ‚áí ('r,'l,nat) expr ‚áí ('r,'l,nat) expr"
  where
  "nat_subst‚á©V e x (CV const) = VE (CV const)"
| "nat_subst‚á©V e x (Var x') = (if x = x' then e else VE (Var x'))"
| "nat_subst‚á©V e x (Loc l) = VE (Loc l)"
| "nat_subst‚á©V e x (Rid r) = VE (Rid r)"
| "nat_subst‚á©V e x (Lambda y e') = VE (
  if x = y then 
    Lambda y e' 
  else 
    let z = Suc (Max (ùí±‚á©E e' ‚à™ ùí±‚á©E e)) in
    Lambda z (nat_subst‚á©E e x (‚Ñõùí±‚á©E (id(y := z)) e')))"
| "nat_subst‚á©E e x (VE v') = nat_subst‚á©V e x v'"
| "nat_subst‚á©E e x (Apply l r) = Apply (nat_subst‚á©E e x l) (nat_subst‚á©E e x r)"
| "nat_subst‚á©E e x (Ite e1 e2 e3) = Ite (nat_subst‚á©E e x e1) (nat_subst‚á©E e x e2) (nat_subst‚á©E e x e3)"
| "nat_subst‚á©E e x (Ref e') = Ref (nat_subst‚á©E e x e')"
| "nat_subst‚á©E e x (Read e') = Read (nat_subst‚á©E e x e')"
| "nat_subst‚á©E e x (Assign l r) = Assign (nat_subst‚á©E e x l) (nat_subst‚á©E e x r)"
| "nat_subst‚á©E e x (Rfork e') = Rfork (nat_subst‚á©E e x e')"
| "nat_subst‚á©E e x (Rjoin e')  = Rjoin (nat_subst‚á©E e x e')"
  by pat_completeness auto
termination 
  by (relation "measure (Œªx. case x of Inl (e,x,v) ‚áí size v | Inr (e,x,e') ‚áí size e')")
     (auto simp add: var_renaming_preserves_size(2))

subsubsection ‚ÄπProof obligations‚Ä∫

lemma nat_subst‚á©E_distr:
  fixes e :: "('r,'l,nat) expr"
  shows "‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ (nat_subst‚á©E e x e') = nat_subst‚á©E (‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e) x (‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e')"
proof -
  fix v' :: "('r,'l,nat) val"
  have
    "(‚àÄŒ± Œ≤ x e Œ∂. ‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ (nat_subst‚á©V e x (‚Ñõùí±‚á©V Œ∂ v')) = nat_subst‚á©V (‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e) x (‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ (‚Ñõùí±‚á©V Œ∂ v'))) ‚àß
     (‚àÄŒ± Œ≤ x e Œ∂. ‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ (nat_subst‚á©E e x (‚Ñõùí±‚á©E Œ∂ e')) = nat_subst‚á©E (‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e) x (‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ (‚Ñõùí±‚á©E Œ∂ e')))"
    by (induct rule: val_expr.induct) (auto simp add: expr.set_map(3) fun.map_ident)
  hence "‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ (nat_subst‚á©E e x (‚Ñõùí±‚á©E id e')) = nat_subst‚á©E (‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e) x (‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ (‚Ñõùí±‚á©E id e'))" by blast
  thus ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma nat_subst‚á©E_introduces_no_rids:
  fixes e' :: "('r,'l,nat) expr"
  shows "RID‚á©E (nat_subst‚á©E e x e') ‚äÜ RID‚á©E e ‚à™ RID‚á©E e'"
proof -
  fix v' :: "('r,'l,nat) val"
  have 
    "(‚àÄx e. ‚àÄŒ∂. RID‚á©E (nat_subst‚á©V e x (‚Ñõùí±‚á©V Œ∂ v')) ‚äÜ RID‚á©E e ‚à™ RID‚á©V (‚Ñõùí±‚á©V Œ∂ v')) ‚àß
     (‚àÄx e. ‚àÄŒ∂. RID‚á©E (nat_subst‚á©E e x (‚Ñõùí±‚á©E Œ∂ e')) ‚äÜ RID‚á©E e ‚à™ RID‚á©E (‚Ñõùí±‚á©E Œ∂ e'))"
    by (induct rule: val_expr.induct) (auto 0 4 simp add: expr.set_map(1))
  hence "RID‚á©E (nat_subst‚á©E e x (‚Ñõùí±‚á©E id e')) ‚äÜ RID‚á©E e ‚à™ RID‚á©E (‚Ñõùí±‚á©E id e')" by blast
  thus ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma nat_subst‚á©E_introduces_no_lids: 
  fixes e' :: "('r,'l,nat) expr"
  shows "LID‚á©E (nat_subst‚á©E e x e') ‚äÜ LID‚á©E e ‚à™ LID‚á©E e'"
proof -
  fix v' :: "('r,'l,nat) val"
  have 
    "(‚àÄx e. ‚àÄŒ∂. LID‚á©E (nat_subst‚á©V e x (‚Ñõùí±‚á©V Œ∂ v')) ‚äÜ LID‚á©E e ‚à™ LID‚á©V (‚Ñõùí±‚á©V Œ∂ v')) ‚àß
     (‚àÄx e. ‚àÄŒ∂. LID‚á©E (nat_subst‚á©E e x (‚Ñõùí±‚á©E Œ∂ e')) ‚äÜ LID‚á©E e ‚à™ LID‚á©E (‚Ñõùí±‚á©E Œ∂ e'))"
    by (induct rule: val_expr.induct) (auto 0 4 simp add: expr.set_map(2))
  hence "LID‚á©E (nat_subst‚á©E e x (‚Ñõùí±‚á©E id e')) ‚äÜ LID‚á©E e ‚à™ LID‚á©E (‚Ñõùí±‚á©E id e')" by blast
  thus ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma nat_subst‚á©E_models_substitution: "substitution nat_subst‚á©E"
  by (simp add: nat_subst‚á©E_distr nat_subst‚á©E_introduces_no_lids nat_subst‚á©E_introduces_no_rids substitution_def)

end

Theory OperationalSemantics

section ‚ÄπOperational Semantics‚Ä∫

text ‚ÄπThis theory defines the operational semantics of the concurrent revisions model. It also
  introduces a relaxed formulation of the operational semantics, and proves the main result required
  for establishing their equivalence.‚Ä∫

theory OperationalSemantics
  imports Substitution
begin

context substitution
begin

subsection Definition

inductive revision_step :: "'r ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí bool" where
  app: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Apply (VE (Lambda x e)) (VE v)]) ‚üπ revision_step r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[subst (VE v) x e])))"
| ifTrue: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Ite (VE (CV T)) e1 e2]) ‚üπ revision_step r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[e1])))"
| ifFalse: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Ite (VE (CV F)) e1 e2]) ‚üπ revision_step r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[e2])))"
(* store operations *)
| new: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Ref (VE v)]) ‚üπ l ‚àâ LID‚á©G s ‚üπ revision_step r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v), ‚Ñ∞[VE (Loc l)])))"
| get: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Read (VE (Loc l))]) ‚üπ l ‚àà dom (œÉ;;œÑ) ‚üπ revision_step r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[VE (the ((œÉ;;œÑ) l))])))"
| set: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Assign (VE (Loc l)) (VE v)]) ‚üπ l ‚àà dom (œÉ;;œÑ) ‚üπ revision_step r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v), ‚Ñ∞[VE (CV Unit)])))"
(* synchronization operations *)
| fork: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Rfork e]) ‚üπ r' ‚àâ RID‚á©G s ‚üπ revision_step r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[VE (Rid r')]), r' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ;;œÑ, Œµ, e)))"
| join: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Rjoin (VE (Rid r'))]) ‚üπ s r' = Some (œÉ', œÑ', VE v) ‚üπ revision_step r s (s(r := Some (œÉ, (œÑ;;œÑ'), ‚Ñ∞[VE (CV Unit)]), r' := None))"
| join‚á©Œµ: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Rjoin (VE (Rid r'))]) ‚üπ s r' = None ‚üπ revision_step r s Œµ"

inductive_cases revision_stepE [elim, consumes 1, case_names app ifTrue ifFalse new get set fork join join‚á©Œµ]:
  "revision_step r s s'"

subsection ‚ÄπIntroduction lemmas for identifiers‚Ä∫

lemma only_new_introduces_lids [intro, dest]:
  assumes 
    step: "revision_step r s s'" and
    not_new: "‚ãÄœÉ œÑ ‚Ñ∞ v. s r ‚â† Some (œÉ,œÑ,‚Ñ∞[Ref (VE v)])"
  shows "LID‚á©G s' ‚äÜ LID‚á©G s"
proof (use step in ‚Äπcases rule: revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
  case fork
  thus ?thesis by (auto simp add: fun_upd_twist ID_distr_global_conditional)
next
  case (join _ _ _ r' _ _ _)
  hence "r ‚â† r'" by auto
  thus ?thesis using join by (auto simp add: fun_upd_twist dest!: in_combination_in_component)
qed (auto simp add: not_new fun_upd_twist ID_distr_global_conditional dest: LID‚á©SI(2))

lemma only_fork_introduces_rids [intro, dest]:
  assumes 
    step: "revision_step r s s'" and
    not_fork: "‚ãÄœÉ œÑ ‚Ñ∞ e. s r ‚â† Some (œÉ,œÑ,‚Ñ∞[Rfork e])"
  shows "RID‚á©G s' ‚äÜ RID‚á©G s"
proof (use step in ‚Äπcases rule: revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
next
  case get
  then show ?thesis by (auto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional)
next
  case fork
  then show ?thesis by (simp add: not_fork)
next
  case (join _ _ _r' _ _ _)
  hence "r ‚â† r'" by auto
  then show ?thesis using join by (auto simp add: fun_upd_twist dest!: in_combination_in_component)
qed (auto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional)

lemma only_fork_introduces_rids' [dest]:
  assumes 
    step: "revision_step r s s'" and
    not_fork: "‚ãÄœÉ œÑ ‚Ñ∞ e. s r ‚â† Some (œÉ,œÑ,‚Ñ∞[Rfork e])"
  shows "r' ‚àâ RID‚á©G s ‚üπ r' ‚àâ RID‚á©G s'"
  using assms by blast

lemma only_new_introduces_lids' [dest]:
  assumes 
    step: "revision_step r s s'" and
    not_new: "‚ãÄœÉ œÑ ‚Ñ∞ v. s r ‚â† Some (œÉ,œÑ,‚Ñ∞[Ref (VE v)])"
  shows "l ‚àâ LID‚á©G s ‚üπ l ‚àâ LID‚á©G s'"
  using assms by blast

subsection ‚ÄπDomain subsumption‚Ä∫

subsubsection Definitions

definition domains_subsume :: "('r,'l,'v) local_state ‚áí bool" ("ùíÆ") where
  "ùíÆ ls = (LID‚á©L ls ‚äÜ doms ls)"

definition domains_subsume_globally :: "('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí bool" ("ùíÆ‚á©G") where
  "ùíÆ‚á©G s = (‚àÄr ls. s r = Some ls ‚ü∂ ùíÆ ls)"

lemma domains_subsume_globallyI [intro]:
  "(‚ãÄr œÉ œÑ e. s r = Some (œÉ,œÑ,e) ‚üπ ùíÆ (œÉ,œÑ,e)) ‚üπ domains_subsume_globally s"
  using domains_subsume_globally_def by auto

definition subsumes_accessible :: "'r ‚áí 'r ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí bool" ("ùíú") where
  "ùíú r‚á©1 r‚á©2 s = (r‚á©2 ‚àà RID‚á©L (the (s r‚á©1)) ‚ü∂ (LID‚á©S ((the (s r‚á©2))‚á©œÉ) ‚äÜ doms (the (s r‚á©1))))"

lemma subsumes_accessibleI [intro]: 
  "(r‚á©2 ‚àà RID‚á©L (the (s r‚á©1)) ‚üπ LID‚á©S ((the (s r‚á©2))‚á©œÉ) ‚äÜ doms (the (s r‚á©1))) ‚üπ ùíú r‚á©1 r‚á©2 s"
  using subsumes_accessible_def by auto

definition subsumes_accessible_globally :: "('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí bool" ("ùíú‚á©G") where
  "ùíú‚á©G s = (‚àÄr‚á©1 r‚á©2. r‚á©1 ‚àà dom s ‚ü∂ r‚á©2 ‚àà dom s ‚ü∂ ùíú r‚á©1 r‚á©2 s)"

lemma subsumes_accessible_globallyI [intro]:
  "(‚ãÄr‚á©1 œÉ‚á©1 œÑ‚á©1 e‚á©1 r‚á©2 œÉ‚á©2 œÑ‚á©2 e‚á©2. s r‚á©1 = Some (œÉ‚á©1,œÑ‚á©1,e‚á©1) ‚üπ s r‚á©2 = Some (œÉ‚á©2,œÑ‚á©2,e‚á©2) ‚üπ ùíú r‚á©1 r‚á©2 s) ‚üπ ùíú‚á©G s"
  using subsumes_accessible_globally_def by auto

subsubsection ‚ÄπThe theorem‚Ä∫

lemma ùíÆ‚á©G_imp_ùíú_refl:
  assumes 
    ùíÆ‚á©G_s: "ùíÆ‚á©G s" and
    r_in_dom: "r ‚àà dom s"
  shows "ùíú r r s" 
  using assms by (auto simp add: domains_subsume_def domains_subsume_globally_def subsumes_accessibleI)

lemma step_preserves_ùíÆ‚á©G_and_ùíú‚á©G:
  assumes 
    step: "revision_step r s s'" and
    ùíÆ‚á©G_s: "ùíÆ‚á©G s" and
    ùíú‚á©G_s: "ùíú‚á©G s"
  shows "ùíÆ‚á©G s'" "ùíú‚á©G s'"
proof -
  show "ùíÆ‚á©G s'"
  proof (rule domains_subsume_globallyI)
    fix r' œÉ œÑ e
    assume s'_r: "s' r' = Some (œÉ,œÑ,e)"
    show "ùíÆ (œÉ,œÑ,e)"
    proof (cases "s' r' = s r'")
      case True
      then show ?thesis using ùíÆ‚á©G_s domains_subsume_globally_def s'_r by auto
    next
      case r'_was_updated: False
      show ?thesis
      proof (use step in ‚Äπcases rule: revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
        case (app œÉ' œÑ' ‚Ñ∞' _ e' v')
        have "r = r'" by (metis fun_upd_apply app(1) r'_was_updated)
        have "LID‚á©L (the (s' r)) ‚äÜ LID‚á©S œÉ' ‚à™ LID‚á©S œÑ' ‚à™ LID‚á©C ‚Ñ∞' ‚à™ LID‚á©E e' ‚à™ LID‚á©V v'" using app(1) by auto
        also have "... = LID‚á©L (the (s r))" using app(2) by auto
        also have "... ‚äÜ doms (the (s r))" 
          by (metis ùíÆ‚á©G_s domains_subsume_def domains_subsume_globally_def local.app(2) option.sel)
        also have "... = doms (the (s' r))" using app by simp
        finally have "ùíÆ (the (s' r))" by (simp add: domains_subsume_def)
        thus ?thesis by (simp add: ‚Äπr = r'‚Ä∫ s'_r)
      next
        case ifTrue
        have "r = r'" by (metis fun_upd_apply ifTrue(1) r'_was_updated)
        have "LID‚á©L (the (s' r)) ‚äÜ LID‚á©L (the (s r))" using ifTrue by auto
        also have "... ‚äÜ doms (the (s r))"
          by (metis ùíÆ‚á©G_s domains_subsume_def domains_subsume_globally_def ifTrue(2) option.sel)
        also have "... = doms (the (s' r))" by (simp add: ifTrue)
        finally have "ùíÆ (the (s' r))" by (simp add: domains_subsume_def)
        thus ?thesis by (simp add: ‚Äπr = r'‚Ä∫ s'_r)
      next
        case ifFalse
        have "r = r'" by (metis fun_upd_apply ifFalse(1) r'_was_updated)
        have "LID‚á©L (the (s' r)) ‚äÜ LID‚á©L (the (s r))" using ifFalse by auto
        also have "... ‚äÜ doms (the (s r))"
          by (metis ùíÆ‚á©G_s domains_subsume_def domains_subsume_globally_def ifFalse(2) option.sel)
        also have "... = doms (the (s' r))" by (simp add: ifFalse)
        finally have "ùíÆ (the (s' r))" by (simp add: domains_subsume_def)
        thus ?thesis by (simp add: ‚Äπr = r'‚Ä∫ s'_r)
      next
        case (new œÉ' œÑ' ‚Ñ∞' v' l')
        have "r = r'" by (metis fun_upd_apply new(1) r'_was_updated)
        have "LID‚á©L (the (s' r)) = insert l' (LID‚á©S œÉ' ‚à™ LID‚á©S œÑ' ‚à™ LID‚á©V v' ‚à™ LID‚á©C ‚Ñ∞')"
        proof -
          have "l' ‚àâ LID‚á©S œÑ'" using new(2-3) by auto
          thus ?thesis using new(1) by auto
        qed
        also have "... = insert l' (LID‚á©L (the (s r)))" using new by auto
        also have "... ‚äÜ insert l' (doms (the (s r)))"
          by (metis ùíÆ‚á©G_s domains_subsume_def domains_subsume_globally_def insert_mono new(2) option.sel)
        also have "... = doms (the (s' r))" using new by auto
        finally have "ùíÆ (the (s' r))" by (simp add: domains_subsume_def)
        thus ?thesis by (simp add: ‚Äπr = r'‚Ä∫ s'_r)
      next
        case get
        have "r = r'" by (metis fun_upd_apply get(1) r'_was_updated)
        have "LID‚á©L (the (s' r)) = LID‚á©L (the (s r))" using get by auto
        also have "... ‚äÜ doms (the (s r))"
          by (metis ùíÆ‚á©G_s domains_subsume_def domains_subsume_globally_def get(2) option.sel)
        also have "... = doms (the (s' r))" by (simp add: get(1-2))
        finally have "ùíÆ (the (s' r))" by (simp add: domains_subsume_def)
        thus ?thesis by (simp add: ‚Äπr = r'‚Ä∫ s'_r)
      next
        case set
        have "r = r'" by (metis fun_upd_apply set(1) r'_was_updated)
        have "LID‚á©L (the (s' r)) ‚äÜ LID‚á©L (the (s r))" using set(1-2) by auto
        also have "... ‚äÜ doms (the (s r))"
          by (metis ùíÆ‚á©G_s domains_subsume_def domains_subsume_globally_def set(2) option.sel)
        also have "... ‚äÜ doms (the (s' r))" using set(1-2) by auto
        finally have "ùíÆ (the (s' r))" by (simp add: domains_subsume_def)
        thus ?thesis by (simp add: ‚Äπr = r'‚Ä∫ s'_r)
      next
        case (fork œÉ' œÑ' _ _ r'')
        have "r = r' ‚à® r'' = r'" using fork r'_was_updated by auto
        then show ?thesis
        proof (rule disjE)
          assume "r = r'"
          have "LID‚á©L (the (s' r)) ‚äÜ LID‚á©L (the (s r))" using fork(1-2) by auto
          also have "... ‚äÜ doms (the (s r))"
            by (metis ùíÆ‚á©G_s domains_subsume_def domains_subsume_globally_def fork(2) option.sel)
          also have "... = doms (the (s' r))" using fork by auto
          finally have "ùíÆ (the (s' r))" by (simp add: domains_subsume_def)
          thus ?thesis by (simp add: ‚Äπr = r'‚Ä∫ s'_r)
        next
          assume "r'' = r'"
          have "LID‚á©L (the (s' r'')) ‚äÜ LID‚á©L (the (s r))" using fork(1-2) by auto
          also have "... ‚äÜ doms (the (s r))"
            by (metis ùíÆ‚á©G_s domains_subsume_def domains_subsume_globally_def fork(2) option.sel)
          also have "... = dom œÉ' ‚à™ dom œÑ'" using fork by simp
          also have "... = dom (œÉ';;œÑ')"  by (simp add: dom_combination_dom_union)
          also have "... = doms (the (s' r''))" using fork by simp
          finally have "ùíÆ (the (s' r''))" by (simp add: domains_subsume_def)
          thus ?thesis by (simp add: ‚Äπr'' = r'‚Ä∫ s'_r)
        qed
      next
        case (join œÉ' œÑ' _ r'' œÉ'' œÑ'' _)
        have "r' = r" by (metis fun_upd_def join(1) option.simps(3) r'_was_updated s'_r)
        have "LID‚á©L (the (s' r)) ‚äÜ LID‚á©L (the (s r)) ‚à™ LID‚á©S œÑ''" using join by auto
        also have "... ‚äÜ doms (the (s r)) ‚à™ LID‚á©S œÑ''"
          by (metis Un_mono ùíÆ‚á©G_s domains_subsume_def domains_subsume_globally_def join(2) option.sel subset_refl)
        also have "... ‚äÜ doms (the (s r)) ‚à™ LID‚á©L (the (s r''))" using join(3) by auto
        also have "... ‚äÜ doms (the (s r)) ‚à™ doms (the (s r''))"
          by (metis (no_types, lifting) Un_absorb ùíÆ‚á©G_s domains_subsume_def domains_subsume_globally_def join(3) option.sel sup.orderI sup_mono)
        also have "... = dom œÉ' ‚à™ dom œÑ' ‚à™ dom œÉ'' ‚à™ dom œÑ''" using join by auto
        also have "... ‚äÜ dom œÉ' ‚à™ dom œÑ' ‚à™ LID‚á©S œÉ'' ‚à™ dom œÑ''" by auto
        also have "... ‚äÜ dom œÉ' ‚à™ dom œÑ' ‚à™ dom œÉ' ‚à™ dom œÑ' ‚à™ dom œÑ''"
        proof -
          have r_r'': "ùíú r r'' s" using ùíú‚á©G_s join(2-3) subsumes_accessible_globally_def by auto
          have r_accesses_r'': "r'' ‚àà RID‚á©L (the (s r))" using join by auto
          have "LID‚á©S œÉ'' ‚äÜ dom œÉ' ‚à™ dom œÑ'" using join subsumes_accessible_def r_r'' r_accesses_r'' by auto
          thus ?thesis by auto
        qed
        also have "... = dom œÉ' ‚à™ dom œÑ' ‚à™ dom œÑ''" by auto
        also have "... = dom œÉ' ‚à™ dom (œÑ';;œÑ'')" by (auto simp add: dom_combination_dom_union)
        also have "... = doms (the (s' r))" using join by auto
        finally have "ùíÆ (the (s' r))" by (simp add: domains_subsume_def)
        thus ?thesis using ‚Äπr' = r‚Ä∫ s'_r by auto
      next
        case join‚á©Œµ
        then show ?thesis using s'_r by blast
      qed
    qed
  qed
  show "ùíú‚á©G s'"
  proof (rule subsumes_accessible_globallyI)
    fix r‚á©1 œÉ‚á©1 œÑ‚á©1 e‚á©1 r‚á©2 œÉ‚á©2 œÑ‚á©2 e‚á©2
    assume 
      s'_r‚á©1: "s' r‚á©1 = Some (œÉ‚á©1, œÑ‚á©1, e‚á©1)" and
      s'_r‚á©2: "s' r‚á©2 = Some (œÉ‚á©2, œÑ‚á©2, e‚á©2)"
    show "ùíú r‚á©1 r‚á©2 s'"
    proof (cases "r‚á©1 = r‚á©2")
      case True
      then show ?thesis using ùíÆ‚á©G_imp_ùíú_refl ‚ÄπùíÆ‚á©G s'‚Ä∫ s'_r‚á©1 by blast
    next
      case r‚á©1_neq_r‚á©2: False
      have r‚á©1_nor_r‚á©2_updated_implies_thesis: "s' r‚á©1 = s r‚á©1 ‚üπ s' r‚á©2 = s r‚á©2 ‚üπ ?thesis"
      proof - 
        assume r‚á©1_unchanged: "s' r‚á©1 = s r‚á©1" and r‚á©2_unchanged: "s' r‚á©2 = s r‚á©2"
        have "ùíú r‚á©1 r‚á©2 s"
          by (metis ùíú‚á©G_s domIff option.discI r‚á©1_unchanged r‚á©2_unchanged s'_r‚á©1 s'_r‚á©2 subsumes_accessible_globally_def)
        show ?thesis using ‚Äπùíú r‚á©1 r‚á©2 s‚Ä∫ r‚á©1_unchanged r‚á©2_unchanged subsumes_accessible_def by auto
      qed
      have r‚á©1_or_r‚á©2_updated_implies_thesis: "s' r‚á©1 ‚â† s r‚á©1 ‚à® s' r‚á©2 ‚â† s r‚á©2 ‚üπ ?thesis"
      proof -
        assume r‚á©1_or_r‚á©2_updated: "s' r‚á©1 ‚â† s r‚á©1 ‚à® s' r‚á©2 ‚â† s r‚á©2"
        show ?thesis

subsection ‚ÄπRelaxed definition of the operational semantics‚Ä∫

inductive revision_step_relaxed :: "'r ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí bool" where
  app: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Apply (VE (Lambda x e)) (VE v)]) ‚üπ revision_step_relaxed r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[subst (VE v) x e])))"
| ifTrue: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Ite (VE (CV T)) e1 e2]) ‚üπ revision_step_relaxed r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[e1])))"
| ifFalse: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Ite (VE (CV F)) e1 e2]) ‚üπ revision_step_relaxed r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[e2])))"
(* store operations *)
| new: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Ref (VE v)]) ‚üπ l ‚àâ ‚ãÉ { doms ls | ls. ls ‚àà ran s } ‚üπ revision_step_relaxed r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v), ‚Ñ∞[VE (Loc l)])))"
| get: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Read (VE (Loc l))]) ‚üπ revision_step_relaxed r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[VE (the ((œÉ;;œÑ) l))])))"
| set: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Assign (VE (Loc l)) (VE v)]) ‚üπ revision_step_relaxed r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v), ‚Ñ∞[VE (CV Unit)])))"
(* synchronization operations *)
| fork: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Rfork e]) ‚üπ r' ‚àâ RID‚á©G s ‚üπ revision_step_relaxed r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[VE (Rid r')]), r' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ;;œÑ, Œµ, e)))"
| join: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Rjoin (VE (Rid r'))]) ‚üπ s r' = Some (œÉ', œÑ', VE v) ‚üπ revision_step_relaxed r s (s(r := Some (œÉ, (œÑ;;œÑ'), ‚Ñ∞[VE (CV Unit)]), r' := None))"
| join‚á©Œµ: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Rjoin (VE (Rid r'))]) ‚üπ s r' = None ‚üπ revision_step_relaxed r s Œµ"

inductive_cases revision_step_relaxedE [elim, consumes 1, case_names app ifTrue ifFalse new get set fork join join‚á©Œµ]: 
  "revision_step_relaxed r s s'"

end (* substitution locale *)

end (* theory *)

Theory Executions

section Executions

text ‚ÄπThis section contains all definitions required for reasoning about executions in the concurrent
  revisions model. It also contains a number of proofs for inductive variants. One of these
  proves the equivalence of the two definitions of the operational semantics. The others are
  required for proving determinacy.‚Ä∫

theory Executions
  imports OperationalSemantics
begin

context substitution
begin

subsection ‚ÄπGeneralizing the original transition‚Ä∫

subsubsection Definition

definition steps :: "('r,'l,'v) global_state rel" ("[‚Üù]") where
  "steps = { (s,s') | s s'. ‚àÉr. revision_step r s s' }"

abbreviation valid_step :: "('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí bool" (infix "‚Üù" 60) where
  "s ‚Üù s' ‚â° (s,s') ‚àà [‚Üù]"

lemma valid_stepI [intro]:
  "revision_step r s s' ‚üπ s ‚Üù s'"
  using steps_def by auto

lemma valid_stepE [dest]:
  "s ‚Üù s' ‚üπ ‚àÉr. revision_step r s s'"
  by (simp add: steps_def)

subsubsection Closures

abbreviation refl_trans_step_rel :: "('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí bool"(infix "‚Üù‚áß*" 60) where
  "s ‚Üù‚áß* s' ‚â° (s,s') ‚àà [‚Üù]‚áß*"

abbreviation refl_step_rel :: "('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí bool" (infix "‚Üù‚áß=" 60) where
  "s ‚Üù‚áß= s' ‚â° (s,s') ‚àà [‚Üù]‚áß="

lemma refl_rewritesI [intro]: "s ‚Üù s' ‚üπ s ‚Üù‚áß= s'" by blast

subsection Properties

abbreviation program_expr :: "('r,'l,'v) expr ‚áí bool" where
  "program_expr e ‚â° LID‚á©E e = {} ‚àß RID‚á©E e = {}"

abbreviation initializes :: "('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) expr ‚áí bool" where
  "initializes s e ‚â° ‚àÉr. s = (Œµ(r ‚Ü¶(Œµ,Œµ,e))) ‚àß program_expr e"

abbreviation initial_state :: "('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí bool" where
  "initial_state s ‚â° ‚àÉe. initializes s e"

definition execution :: "('r,'l,'v) expr ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí bool" where
  "execution e s s' ‚â° initializes s e ‚àß s ‚Üù‚áß* s'"

definition maximal_execution :: "('r,'l,'v) expr ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí bool" where
  "maximal_execution e s s' ‚â° execution e s s' ‚àß (‚àÑs''. s' ‚Üù s'')"

definition reachable :: "('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí bool" where
  "reachable s ‚â° ‚àÉe s'. execution e s' s"

definition terminates_in :: "('r,'l,'v) expr ‚áí ('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí bool" (infix "‚Üì" 60) where
  "e ‚Üì s' ‚â° ‚àÉs. maximal_execution e s s'"

subsection Invariants

subsubsection ‚ÄπInductive invariance‚Ä∫

definition inductive_invariant :: "(('r,'l,'v) global_state ‚áí bool) ‚áí bool" where
  "inductive_invariant P ‚â° (‚àÄs. initial_state s ‚ü∂ P s) ‚àß (‚àÄs s'. s ‚Üù s' ‚ü∂ P s ‚ü∂ P s')"

lemma inductive_invariantI [intro]:
  "(‚ãÄs. initial_state s ‚üπ P s) ‚üπ (‚ãÄs s'. s ‚Üù s' ‚üπ P s ‚üπ P s') ‚üπ inductive_invariant P"
  by (auto simp add: inductive_invariant_def)

lemma inductive_invariant_is_execution_invariant: "reachable s ‚üπ inductive_invariant P ‚üπ P s"
proof -
  assume reach: "reachable s" and ind_inv: "inductive_invariant P"
  then obtain e initial n where initializes: "initializes initial e" and trace: "(initial,s) ‚àà [‚Üù]^^n"
    by (metis execution_def reachable_def rtrancl_power)
  thus "P s"
  proof (induct n arbitrary: s)
    case 0
    have "initial = s"   using "0.prems"(2) by auto
    hence "initial_state s" using initializes by blast
    then show ?case using ind_inv inductive_invariant_def by auto
  next
    case (Suc n)
    obtain s' where nfold: "(initial, s') ‚àà [‚Üù]^^n" and step: "s' ‚Üù s" using Suc.prems(2) by auto
    have "P s'" using Suc(1) nfold initializes by blast
    then show ?case using ind_inv step inductive_invariant_def by auto
  qed
qed

subsubsection ‚ÄπSubsumption is invariant‚Ä∫

lemma nice_ind_inv_is_inductive_invariant: "inductive_invariant (Œªs. ùíÆ‚á©G s ‚àß ùíú‚á©G s)"
proof (rule inductive_invariantI)
  fix s
  assume "initial_state s"
  then obtain e r where s: "s = Œµ(r ‚Ü¶ (Œµ, Œµ, e))" and prog_expr_e: "program_expr e" by blast
  show "ùíÆ‚á©G s ‚àß ùíú‚á©G s"
  proof (rule conjI)
    show "ùíÆ‚á©G s"
    proof (rule domains_subsume_globallyI)
      fix r' œÉ' œÑ' e'
      assume s_r': "s r' = Some (œÉ',œÑ',e')"
      have "r' = r" using s s_r' prog_expr_e by (meson domI domIff fun_upd_other)
      hence "LID‚á©L (œÉ',œÑ',e') = LID‚á©L (Œµ, Œµ, e)" using s s_r' by auto
      also have "... = {}" using prog_expr_e by auto
      also have "... = dom œÉ' ‚à™ dom œÑ'" using ‚Äπr' = r‚Ä∫ s s_r' by auto
      finally show "ùíÆ (œÉ', œÑ', e')" by (simp add: domains_subsume_def)
    qed
    show "ùíú‚á©G s"
    proof (rule subsumes_accessible_globallyI)
      fix r‚á©1 œÉ‚á©1 œÑ‚á©1 e‚á©1 r‚á©2 œÉ‚á©2 œÑ‚á©2 e‚á©2
      assume s_r1: "s r‚á©1 = Some (œÉ‚á©1, œÑ‚á©1, e‚á©1)" and s_r2: "s r‚á©2 = Some (œÉ‚á©2, œÑ‚á©2, e‚á©2)"
      have "r‚á©2 = r" using s s_r2 prog_expr_e  by (meson domI domIff fun_upd_other)
      hence "œÉ‚á©2 = Œµ" using s s_r2 by auto
      hence "LID‚á©S œÉ‚á©2 = {}" by auto
      thus "ùíú r‚á©1 r‚á©2 s" using s_r2 by auto
    qed
  qed
qed (use step_preserves_ùíÆ‚á©G_and_ùíú‚á©G in auto)

corollary reachable_imp_ùíÆ‚á©G: "reachable s ‚üπ ùíÆ‚á©G s"
proof -
  assume reach: "reachable s"
  have "ùíÆ‚á©G s ‚àß ùíú‚á©G s" by (rule inductive_invariant_is_execution_invariant[OF reach nice_ind_inv_is_inductive_invariant]) 
  thus ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma transition_relations_equivalent: "reachable s ‚üπ revision_step r s s' = revision_step_relaxed r s s'"
proof -
  assume reach: "reachable s"
  have doms_sub_local: "ùíÆ‚á©G s" by (rule reachable_imp_ùíÆ‚á©G[OF reach])
  show "revision_step r s s' = revision_step_relaxed r s s'"
  proof (rule iffI)
    assume step: "revision_step r s s'"
    show "revision_step_relaxed r s s'"
    proof (use step in ‚Äπinduct rule: revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
      case (new œÉ œÑ ‚Ñ∞ v l)
      have "revision_step_relaxed r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v), ‚Ñ∞ [VE (Loc l)])))"
      proof (rule revision_step_relaxed.new)
        show "l ‚àâ ‚ãÉ { doms ls | ls. ls ‚àà ran s}"
        proof 
          assume "l ‚àà ‚ãÉ { doms ls | ls. ls ‚àà ran s}"
          then obtain ls where in_ran: "ls ‚àà ran s" and in_doms: "l ‚àà doms ls" by blast
          from in_doms have "l ‚àà LID‚á©L ls" by (cases ls) auto
          have "l ‚àà LID‚á©G s"
          proof -
            have "ls ‚àà {ls. ‚àÉr. s r = Some ls}" by (metis (full_types) in_ran ran_def)
            then show ?thesis using ‚Äπl ‚àà LID‚á©L ls‚Ä∫ by blast
          qed
          thus False using new by auto
        qed
      qed (simp add: new.hyps(2))
      thus ?thesis using new.hyps(1) by blast
    qed (use revision_step_relaxed.intros in simp)+
  next
    assume step: "revision_step_relaxed r s s'"
    show "revision_step r s s'"
    proof (use step in ‚Äπinduct rule: revision_step_relaxedE‚Ä∫)
      case (new œÉ œÑ ‚Ñ∞ v l)
      have "revision_step r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v), ‚Ñ∞ [VE (Loc l)])))"
      proof (rule revision_step.new)
        show "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [Ref (VE v)])" by (simp add: new.hyps(2))
        show "l ‚àâ LID‚á©G s"
        proof
          assume "l ‚àà LID‚á©G s"
          then obtain r' œÉ' œÑ' e' where s_r': "s r' = Some (œÉ',œÑ',e')" and l_in_local: "l ‚àà LID‚á©L (œÉ',œÑ',e')" by auto
          hence "l ‚àà dom œÉ' ‚à™ dom œÑ'"
            by (metis (no_types, lifting) domains_subsume_def domains_subsume_globally_def doms.simps doms_sub_local rev_subsetD)
          thus False by (meson s_r' new.hyps(3) ranI)
        qed
      qed
      then show ?case using new.hyps(1) by blast
    next
      case (get œÉ œÑ ‚Ñ∞ l)
      have "revision_step r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [VE (the ((œÉ;;œÑ) l))])))"
      proof 
       show "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [Read (VE (Loc l))])" by (simp add: get.hyps(2))
       show "l ‚àà dom (œÉ;;œÑ)"
       proof -
         have "l ‚àà LID‚á©L (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [Read (VE (Loc l))])"  by simp
         hence "l ‚àà dom œÉ ‚à™ dom œÑ"
           using domains_subsume_def domains_subsume_globally_def doms_sub_local get.hyps(2) by fastforce
         thus "l ‚àà dom (œÉ;;œÑ)" by (simp add: dom_combination_dom_union)
       qed
     qed
     then show ?case using get.hyps(1) by auto
    next
      case (set œÉ œÑ ‚Ñ∞ l v)
      have "revision_step r s (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v), ‚Ñ∞ [VE (CV Unit)])))"
      proof 
       show "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [Assign (VE (Loc l)) (VE v)])" by (simp add: set.hyps(2))
       show "l ‚àà dom (œÉ;;œÑ)"
       proof -
         have "l ‚àà LID‚á©L (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [Assign (VE (Loc l)) (VE v)])"  by simp
         hence "l ‚àà dom œÉ ‚à™ dom œÑ"
           using domains_subsume_def domains_subsume_globally_def doms_sub_local set.hyps(2) by fastforce
         thus "l ‚àà dom (œÉ;;œÑ)" by (simp add: dom_combination_dom_union)
       qed
     qed
     then show ?case using set.hyps(1) by blast
    qed (simp add: revision_step.intros)+
  qed
qed

subsubsection ‚ÄπFinitude is invariant‚Ä∫

lemma finite_occurrences_val_expr [simp]:
  fixes 
    v :: "('r,'l,'v) val" and
    e :: "('r,'l,'v) expr"
  shows
  "finite (RID‚á©V v)"
  "finite (RID‚á©E e)"
  "finite (LID‚á©V v)"
  "finite (LID‚á©E e)"
proof -
  have "(finite (RID‚á©V v) ‚àß finite (LID‚á©V v)) ‚àß finite (RID‚á©E e) ‚àß finite (LID‚á©E e)"
    by (induct rule: val_expr.induct) auto
  thus  
    "finite (RID‚á©V v)"
    "finite (RID‚á©E e)"
    "finite (LID‚á©V v)"
    "finite (LID‚á©E e)"
    by auto
qed

lemma store_finite_upd [intro]:
  "finite (RID‚á©S œÑ) ‚üπ finite (RID‚á©S (œÑ(l := None)))" 
  "finite (LID‚á©S œÑ) ‚üπ finite (LID‚á©S (œÑ(l := None)))"
  apply (meson ID_restricted_store_subset_store(1) finite_subset)
  by (simp add: ID_restricted_store_subset_store(2) rev_finite_subset)

lemma finite_state_imp_restriction_finite [intro]: 
  "finite (RID‚á©G s) ‚üπ finite (RID‚á©G (s(r := None)))"
  "finite (LID‚á©G s) ‚üπ finite (LID‚á©G (s(r := None)))"
proof -
  assume "finite (RID‚á©G s)"
  thus "finite (RID‚á©G (s(r := None)))" by (meson infinite_super ID_restricted_global_subset_unrestricted)
next
  assume fin: "finite (LID‚á©G s)"
  have "LID‚á©G (s(r := None)) ‚äÜ LID‚á©G s" by auto
  thus "finite (LID‚á©G (s(r := None)))" using fin finite_subset by auto
qed

lemma local_state_of_finite_restricted_global_state_is_finite [intro]: 
  "s r' = Some ls ‚üπ finite (RID‚á©G (s(r := None))) ‚üπ r ‚â† r' ‚üπ finite (RID‚á©L ls)"
  "s r' = Some ls ‚üπ finite (LID‚á©G (s(r := None))) ‚üπ r ‚â† r' ‚üπ finite (LID‚á©L ls)"
   apply (metis (no_types, lifting) ID_distr_global(1) finite_Un finite_insert fun_upd_triv fun_upd_twist)
  by (metis ID_distr_global(2) finite_Un fun_upd_triv fun_upd_twist)

lemma empty_map_finite [simp]: 
  "finite (RID‚á©S Œµ)" 
  "finite (LID‚á©S Œµ)" 
  "finite (RID‚á©G Œµ)" 
  "finite (LID‚á©G Œµ)" 
  by (simp add: RID‚á©S_def LID‚á©S_def RID‚á©G_def LID‚á©G_def)+

lemma finite_combination [intro]:
  "finite (RID‚á©S œÉ) ‚üπ finite (RID‚á©S œÑ) ‚üπ finite (RID‚á©S (œÉ;;œÑ))"
  "finite (LID‚á©S œÉ) ‚üπ finite (LID‚á©S œÑ) ‚üπ finite (LID‚á©S (œÉ;;œÑ))"
  by (meson finite_UnI rev_finite_subset ID_combination_subset_union)+

lemma RID‚á©G_finite_invariant:
  assumes
    step: "revision_step r s s'" and
    fin: "finite (RID‚á©G s)"
shows
    "finite (RID‚á©G s')"
proof (use step in ‚Äπcases rule: revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
  case (join œÉ œÑ ‚Ñ∞ r' œÉ' œÑ' v)
  hence "r ‚â† r'" by auto
  then show ?thesis 
    by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) ID_distr_global(1) ID_distr_local(2) fin finite_Un finite_combination(1) finite_insert finite_occurrences_val_expr(2) finite_state_imp_restriction_finite(1) join local_state_of_finite_restricted_global_state_is_finite(1))
qed (use fin in ‚Äπauto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional‚Ä∫)

lemma RID‚á©L_finite_invariant:
  assumes
    step: "revision_step r s s'" and
    fin: "finite (LID‚á©G s)"
shows
    "finite (LID‚á©G s')"
proof (use step in ‚Äπcases rule: revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
  case (join œÉ œÑ ‚Ñ∞ r' œÉ' œÑ' v)
  hence "r ‚â† r'" by auto
  then show ?thesis 
    using join assms
    by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) ID_distr_global(2) ID_distr_local(1) fin finite_Un finite_combination(2) finite_occurrences_val_expr(4) finite_state_imp_restriction_finite(2) join local_state_of_finite_restricted_global_state_is_finite(2))
qed (use fin in ‚Äπauto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional‚Ä∫)
 
lemma reachable_imp_identifiers_finite:
  assumes reach: "reachable s"
  shows 
    "finite (RID‚á©G s)"
    "finite (LID‚á©G s)"
proof -
  from reach obtain e r where exec: "execution e (Œµ(r ‚Ü¶ (Œµ,Œµ,e))) s" using reachable_def execution_def by auto
  hence prog_exp: "program_expr e" by (meson execution_def)
  obtain n where n_reachable: "(Œµ(r ‚Ü¶ (Œµ,Œµ,e)), s) ‚àà [‚Üù]^^n" using exec by (meson execution_def rtrancl_imp_relpow)
  hence "finite (RID‚á©G s) ‚àß finite (LID‚á©G s)"
  proof (induct n arbitrary: s)
    case 0
    hence s: "s = Œµ(r ‚Ü¶ (Œµ, Œµ, e))" by auto
    hence rid_dom: "dom s = {r}" by auto
    hence rid_ran: "‚ãÉ (RID‚á©L ` ran s) = {}" using s by (auto simp add: prog_exp)
    have rids: "RID‚á©G s = {r}" by (unfold RID‚á©G_def, use rid_dom rid_ran in auto)
    have lid_ran: "‚ãÉ (LID‚á©L ` ran s) = {}" using s by (auto simp add: prog_exp)
    hence lids: "LID‚á©G s = {}" by (unfold LID‚á©G_def, simp)
    thus ?case using rids lids by simp
  next
    case (Suc n)
    then obtain s' where 
      n_steps: "(Œµ(r ‚Ü¶ (Œµ, Œµ, e)), s') ‚àà [‚Üù]^^n" and 
      step: "s' ‚Üù s" 
      by (meson relpow_Suc_E)
    have fin_rid: "finite (RID‚á©G s')" using Suc.hyps n_steps by blast
    have fin_lid: "finite (LID‚á©G s')" using Suc.hyps n_steps by blast
    thus ?case by (meson RID‚á©G_finite_invariant RID‚á©L_finite_invariant fin_rid local.step valid_stepE)
  qed
  thus "finite (RID‚á©G s)" "finite (LID‚á©G s)" by auto
qed

lemma reachable_imp_identifiers_available:
  assumes 
    "reachable (s :: ('r,'l,'v) global_state)"
  shows 
    "infinite (UNIV :: 'r set) ‚üπ ‚àÉr. r ‚àâ RID‚á©G s"
    "infinite (UNIV :: 'l set) ‚üπ ‚àÉl. l ‚àâ LID‚á©G s"
  by (simp add: assms ex_new_if_finite reachable_imp_identifiers_finite)+

subsubsection ‚ÄπReachability is invariant‚Ä∫

lemma initial_state_reachable:
  assumes "program_expr e"
  shows "reachable (Œµ(r ‚Ü¶ (Œµ,Œµ,e)))"
proof -
  have "initializes (Œµ(r ‚Ü¶ (Œµ,Œµ,e))) e" using assms by auto
  hence "execution e (Œµ(r ‚Ü¶ (Œµ,Œµ,e))) (Œµ(r ‚Ü¶ (Œµ,Œµ,e)))" by (simp add: execution_def)
  thus ?thesis using reachable_def by blast
qed

lemma reachability_closed_under_execution_step:
  assumes
    reach: "reachable s" and
    step: "revision_step r s s'"
  shows "reachable s'"
proof -
  obtain init e where exec: "execution e init s" using reach reachable_def by blast
  hence init_s:"init ‚Üù‚áß* s" by (simp add: execution_def)
  have s_s': "s ‚Üù s'" using step by blast 
  have "init ‚Üù‚áß* s'" using init_s s_s' by auto
  hence "execution e init s'" using exec by (simp add: execution_def)
  thus ?thesis using reachable_def by auto
qed

lemma reachability_closed_under_execution: "reachable s ‚üπ s ‚Üù‚áß* s' ‚üπ reachable s'"
proof -
  assume reach: "reachable s" and "s ‚Üù‚áß* s'"
  then obtain n where "(s, s') ‚àà [‚Üù]^^n" using rtrancl_imp_relpow by blast
  thus "reachable s'"
  proof (induct n arbitrary: s')
    case 0
    thus ?case using reach by auto
  next 
    case (Suc n)
    obtain s'' where "(s,s'') ‚àà [‚Üù]^^n" "s'' ‚Üù s'" using Suc.prems by auto
    have "reachable s''" by (simp add: Suc.hyps ‚Äπ(s, s'') ‚àà [‚Üù]^^n‚Ä∫)
    then show ?case using ‚Äπs'' ‚Üù s'‚Ä∫ reachability_closed_under_execution_step by blast
  qed
qed

end (* substitution locale *)

end (* theory *)

section Determinacy

  imports Executions

lemma app_deterministic [simp]:
  assumes
    s_r: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [Apply (VE (Lambda x e)) (VE v)])"
  shows "(revision_step r s s') = (s' = (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [subst (VE v) x e]))))" (is "?l = ?r")
proof (rule iffI)
  assume ?l
  thus ?r by (cases rule: revision_stepE) (use s_r in auto)
qed (simp add: s_r revision_step.app)

lemma ifTrue_deterministic [simp]:
  assumes
    s_r: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [Ite (VE (CV T)) e1 e2])"
  shows "(revision_step r s s') = (s' = (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [e1]))))" (is "?l = ?r")
proof (rule iffI)
  assume ?l
  thus ?r by (cases rule: revision_stepE) (use s_r in auto)
qed (simp add: s_r revision_step.ifTrue)

lemma ifFalse_deterministic [simp]:

    s_r: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [Ite (VE (CV F)) e1 e2])"

  thus ?r by (cases rule: revision_stepE) (use s_r in auto)

lemma fork_pseudodeterministic [simp]:
  assumes
    s_r: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [Rfork e])"
  shows "(revision_step r s s') = (‚àÉr'. r' ‚àâ RID‚á©G (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [Rfork e]))) ‚àß s' = (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [VE (Rid r')]), r' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ;;œÑ, Œµ, e))))" (is "?l = ?r")

  assume step: ?l
  show ?r
  proof (use step in ‚Äπcases rule: revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
    case (fork œÉ œÑ ‚Ñ∞ e r')
    show ?thesis by (rule exI[where x=r']) (use fork s_r in auto)
  qed (auto simp add: s_r)
qed (auto simp add: s_r revision_step.fork map_upd_triv)

lemma rjoin_deterministic [simp]:
  assumes
    s_r: "s r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [Rjoin (VE (Rid r'))])" and
    s_r': "s r' = Some (œÉ', œÑ', VE v)"
  shows "(revision_step r s s') = (s' = (s(r := Some (œÉ, œÑ;;œÑ', ‚Ñ∞ [VE (CV Unit)]), r' := None)))" (is "?l = ?r")
proof (rule iffI)
  assume step: ?l
  show ?r by (cases rule: revision_stepE[OF step]) (use s_r s_r' in auto)
qed (meson s_r s_r' revision_step.join)
