qed (simp add: revision_step.join‚á©Œµ s_r s_r')

subsection ‚ÄπStrong local confluence‚Ä∫

subsubsection ‚ÄπLocal determinism‚Ä∫

lemma local_determinism:
  assumes
    left: "revision_step r s‚á©1 s‚á©2" and
    right: "revision_step r s‚á©1 s‚á©2'"
  shows "s‚á©2 ‚âà s‚á©2'"
proof (use left in ‚Äπinduct rule:revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
  case (new œÉ œÑ ‚Ñ∞ v l)
  from new(2) right obtain l' where 
    side: "l' ‚àâ LID‚á©G s‚á©1" and
    s‚á©2': "s‚á©2' = s‚á©1(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ(l' ‚Ü¶ v), ‚Ñ∞[VE (Loc l')]))"
    by auto
  let "?Œ≤" = "id(l := l', l' := l)"
  have bij_Œ≤: "bij ?Œ≤" by (rule swap_bij)
  have renaming: "‚Ñõ‚á©G id ?Œ≤ s‚á©2 = s‚á©2'" 
    by (use new side s‚á©2' bij_Œ≤ in ‚Äπauto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional‚Ä∫)
  show ?case by (rule eq_statesI[OF renaming bij_id bij_Œ≤])
next
  case (fork œÉ œÑ ‚Ñ∞ e r')
  from fork(2) right obtain r'' where 
    side: "r'' ‚àâ RID‚á©G s‚á©1" and
    s‚á©2': "s‚á©2' = s‚á©1(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [VE (Rid r'')]), r'' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ;;œÑ, Œµ, e))"
    by (auto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional)
  let "?Œ±" = "id(r' := r'', r'' := r')"
  have bij_Œ±: "bij ?Œ±" by (rule swap_bij)
  have renaming: "‚Ñõ‚á©G ?Œ± id s‚á©2 = s‚á©2'" 
    by (use fork side s‚á©2' bij_Œ± in ‚Äπauto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional‚Ä∫)
  show ?case by (rule eq_statesI[OF renaming bij_Œ± bij_id])
qed ((rule eq_statesI[of id id], use assms in auto)[1])+

subsubsection ‚ÄπGeneral principles‚Ä∫

lemma SLC_sym:
  "‚àÉs‚á©3' s‚á©3. s‚á©3' ‚âà s‚á©3 ‚àß (revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3' ‚à® s‚á©2 = s‚á©3') ‚àß (revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3 ‚à® s‚á©2' = s‚á©3) ‚üπ
   ‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß (revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3 ‚à® s‚á©2' = s‚á©3) ‚àß (revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3' ‚à® s‚á©2 = s‚á©3')"
  by (metis Œ±Œ≤_sym)

lemma SLC_commute: 
  "‚ü¶ s‚á©3 = s‚á©3'; revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3; revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3' ‚üß ‚üπ 
  s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß (revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3 ‚à® s‚á©2 = s‚á©3) ‚àß (revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3' ‚à® s‚á©2' = s‚á©3')"
  using Œ±Œ≤_refl by auto

subsubsection ‚ÄπCase join-epsilon‚Ä∫

lemma SLC_join‚á©Œµ:
  assumes
    s‚á©1_r: "s‚á©1 r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Rjoin (VE (Rid r''))])" and
    s‚á©2: "s‚á©2 = Œµ" and
    side: "s‚á©1 r'' = None" and
    right: "revision_step r' s‚á©1 s‚á©2'" and
    neq: "r ‚â† r'"
  shows
    "‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß (revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3 ‚à® s‚á©2 = s‚á©3) ‚àß (revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3' ‚à® s‚á©2' = s‚á©3')"
proof -
  have right_collapsed_case: "s‚á©2' = Œµ ‚üπ ?thesis" 
    by (rule exI[where x=Œµ], rule exI[where x=Œµ], use s‚á©2 in auto)
  have left_step_still_available_case: "s‚á©2' ‚â† Œµ ‚üπ s‚á©2' r = s‚á©1 r ‚üπ s‚á©2' r'' = None ‚üπ ?thesis"
    by (rule exI[where x=Œµ], rule exI[where x=Œµ]) (use assms in auto)
  show ?thesis
  proof (use right in ‚Äπcases rule: revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
    case (join _ _ _ right_joinee)
    have r_unchanged_left: "s‚á©2' r = s‚á©1 r" using join assms by auto
    have r'_unchanged_right: "s‚á©2' r'' = None" using join assms by auto
    have "right_joinee ‚â† r'" using join(2-3) by auto
    hence s‚á©2'_nonempty: "s‚á©2' ‚â† Œµ" using assms join by (auto simp add: fun_upd_twist)
    show ?thesis by (rule left_step_still_available_case[OF s‚á©2'_nonempty r_unchanged_left r'_unchanged_right])
  next
    case join‚á©Œµ
    show ?thesis by (rule right_collapsed_case, use join‚á©Œµ(2-3) right in auto)
  qed ((rule left_step_still_available_case, use side neq s‚á©1_r right in auto)[1])+
qed

subsubsection ‚ÄπCase join‚Ä∫

lemma join_and_local_commute:
  assumes
    "s‚á©2 = s‚á©1(r := Some (œÉ, œÑ;;œÑ', ‚Ñ∞[VE (CV Unit)]), r'' := None)"
    "s‚á©2' = s‚á©1(r' ‚Ü¶ ls)"
    "r ‚â† r'"
    "r' ‚â† r''"
    "revision_step r' s‚á©2 (s‚á©1(r := Some (œÉ, œÑ;;œÑ', ‚Ñ∞[VE (CV Unit)]), r'' := None, r' := Some ls))"
    "s‚á©2' r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [Rjoin (VE (Rid r''))])"
    "s‚á©2' r'' = Some (œÉ', œÑ', VE v)"
  shows
    "‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß (revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3 ‚à® s‚á©2 = s‚á©3) ‚àß (revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3' ‚à® s‚á©2' = s‚á©3')"
  apply (rule exI[where x="s‚á©1(r := Some (œÉ, œÑ;;œÑ', ‚Ñ∞[VE (CV Unit)]), r'' := None, r' := Some ls)"])
  apply (rule exI[where x="s‚á©1(r' := Some ls, r := Some (œÉ, œÑ;;œÑ', ‚Ñ∞[VE (CV Unit)]), r'' := None)"])
  by (rule SLC_commute, use assms in auto)

lemma SLC_join:
  assumes
    s‚á©1_r: "s‚á©1 r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Rjoin (VE (Rid r''))])" and
    s‚á©2: "s‚á©2 = (s‚á©1(r := Some (œÉ, (œÑ;;œÑ'), ‚Ñ∞[VE (CV Unit)]), r'' := None))" and
    side: "s‚á©1 r'' = Some (œÉ', œÑ', VE v)" and 
    right: "revision_step r' s‚á©1 s‚á©2'" and
    neq: "r ‚â† r'"
  shows
    "‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß (revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3 ‚à® s‚á©2 = s‚á©3) ‚àß (revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3' ‚à® s‚á©2' = s‚á©3')"
proof -
  have left_step: "revision_step r s‚á©1 s‚á©2" using s‚á©1_r s‚á©2 side by auto
  have r'_not_joined: "r' ‚â† r''" using right side by auto
  show ?thesis
  proof (use right in ‚Äπcases rule: revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
    case (new _ _ _ _ l)
    have l_fresh_left: "l ‚àâ LID‚á©G s‚á©2" by (rule only_new_introduces_lids'[OF left_step]) (use new right s‚á©1_r in auto)
    show ?thesis by (rule join_and_local_commute, use assms r'_not_joined new l_fresh_left in auto)
  next
    case (fork _ _ _ _ r''')
    have r'_unchanged_left: "s‚á©2 r' = s‚á©1 r'" using fork assms by auto
    have r'''_fresh_left: "r''' ‚àâ RID‚á©G s‚á©2" using left_step fork(3) only_fork_introduces_rids' s‚á©1_r by auto 
    have r_unchanged_right: "s‚á©2' r = s‚á©1 r" using fork assms by auto
    have r''_unchanged_right: "s‚á©2' r'' = s‚á©1 r''" using fork assms by auto
    let "?s‚á©3" = "s‚á©2(r' := s‚á©2' r', r''' := s‚á©2' r''')"
    let "?s‚á©3'" = "s‚á©2'(r := s‚á©2 r, r'' := None)"
    show ?thesis 
    proof (rule exI[where x="?s‚á©3"],rule exI[where x="?s‚á©3'"], rule SLC_commute)
      show "?s‚á©3 = ?s‚á©3'" using fork(1) fork(3) neq r'_not_joined s‚á©1_r s‚á©2 by (auto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional)
      show "revision_step r' s‚á©2 ?s‚á©3" using fork(1-2) r'_unchanged_left r'''_fresh_left by (auto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional) 
      show "revision_step r s‚á©2' ?s‚á©3'" using r''_unchanged_right r_unchanged_right s‚á©1_r s‚á©2 side by auto
    qed
  next
    case (join _ _ _ r''')
    have r'_unchanged_left: "s‚á©2 r' = s‚á©1 r'" using join(2) neq r'_not_joined s‚á©2 by auto
    have r_unchanged_right: "s‚á©2' r = s‚á©1 r" using join(1,3) neq s‚á©1_r by auto
    show ?thesis
    proof (cases "r'' = r'''")
      case True
      have r'''_none_left: "s‚á©2 r''' = None" by (simp add: True s‚á©2)
      have r''_none_right: "s‚á©2' r'' = None" by (simp add: True join(1))
      show ?thesis
      proof (rule exI[where x=Œµ], rule exI[where x=Œµ], rule SLC_commute)
        show "Œµ = Œµ" by (rule refl)
        show "revision_step r' s‚á©2 Œµ" using r'_unchanged_left r'''_none_left join(2) by auto
        show "revision_step r s‚á©2' Œµ" using r_unchanged_right r''_none_right s‚á©1_r by auto
      qed
    next
      case False
      have r'''_unchanged_left: "s‚á©2 r''' = s‚á©1 r'''" using False join(1,3) s‚á©2 r_unchanged_right by auto
      have r''_unchanged_right': "s‚á©2' r'' = s‚á©1 r''" using False join(1) r'_not_joined side by auto
      let "?s‚á©3" = "s‚á©2(r' := s‚á©2' r', r''' := None)"
      let "?s‚á©3'" = "s‚á©2'(r := s‚á©2 r, r'' := None)"
      show ?thesis
      proof (rule exI[where x="?s‚á©3"], rule exI[where x="?s‚á©3'"], rule SLC_commute)
        show "?s‚á©3 = ?s‚á©3'" using join(1) neq r'_not_joined r_unchanged_right s‚á©1_r s‚á©2 s‚á©1_r by fastforce
        show "revision_step r' s‚á©2 ?s‚á©3" by (simp add: join r'''_unchanged_left r'_unchanged_left)
        show "revision_step r s‚á©2' ?s‚á©3'" using r''_unchanged_right' r_unchanged_right s‚á©1_r side s‚á©2 by auto
      qed
    qed
  next
    case join‚á©Œµ
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_join‚á©Œµ, use left_step neq right join‚á©Œµ in auto)
  qed ((rule join_and_local_commute, use assms r'_not_joined in auto)[1])+
qed

subsubsection ‚ÄπCase local‚Ä∫

lemma local_steps_commute:
  assumes
    "s‚á©2 = s‚á©1(r ‚Ü¶ x)"
    "s‚á©2' = s‚á©1(r' ‚Ü¶ y)"
    "revision_step r' (s‚á©1(r ‚Ü¶ x)) (s‚á©1(r ‚Ü¶ x, r' ‚Ü¶ y))"
    "revision_step r (s‚á©1(r' ‚Ü¶ y)) (s‚á©1(r' ‚Ü¶ y, r ‚Ü¶ x))"
  shows
    "‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß (revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3 ‚à® s‚á©2 = s‚á©3) ‚àß (revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3' ‚à® s‚á©2' = s‚á©3')"
  by (metis (no_types, lifting) assms fun_upd_twist fun_upd_upd local_determinism)

lemma local_and_fork_commute:
  assumes
    "s‚á©2 = s‚á©1(r ‚Ü¶ x)"
    "s‚á©2' = s‚á©1(r' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [VE (Rid r'')]), r'' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ;;œÑ, Œµ, e))"
    "s‚á©2 r' = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Rfork e])"
    "r'' ‚àâ RID‚á©G s‚á©2"
    "revision_step r s‚á©2' (s‚á©1(r' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [VE (Rid r'')]), r'' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ;;œÑ, Œµ, e), r ‚Ü¶ x))"
    "r ‚â† r'"
    "r ‚â† r''"
  shows
    "‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. (s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3') ‚àß (revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3 ‚à® s‚á©2 = s‚á©3) ‚àß (revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3' ‚à® s‚á©2' = s‚á©3')"
  proof(rule exI[where x="s‚á©1(r ‚Ü¶ x, r' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [VE (Rid r'')]), r'' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ;;œÑ, Œµ, e))"],
        rule exI[where x="s‚á©1(r' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [VE (Rid r'')]), r'' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ;;œÑ, Œµ, e), r ‚Ü¶ x)"],
        rule SLC_commute)
  show "s‚á©1(r ‚Ü¶ x, r' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [VE (Rid r'')]), r'' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ;;œÑ, Œµ, e)) = 
    s‚á©1(r' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [VE (Rid r'')]), r'' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ;;œÑ, Œµ, e), r ‚Ü¶ x)"
    using assms revision_step.fork by auto
  show "revision_step r' s‚á©2 (s‚á©1(r ‚Ü¶ x, r' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [VE (Rid r'')]), r'' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ;;œÑ, Œµ, e)))"
    using assms(1) assms(3) assms(4) revision_step.fork by blast
  show "revision_step r s‚á©2' (s‚á©1(r' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [VE (Rid r'')]), r'' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ;;œÑ, Œµ, e), r ‚Ü¶ x))"
    using assms(5) by blast
qed
 
lemma SLC_app:
  assumes
    s‚á©1_r: "s‚á©1 r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Apply (VE (Lambda x e)) (VE v)])" and
    s‚á©2: "s‚á©2 = s‚á©1(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[subst (VE v) x e]))" and
    right: "revision_step r' s‚á©1 s‚á©2'" and
    neq: "r ‚â† r'"
  shows
    "‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß (revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3 ‚à® s‚á©2 = s‚á©3) ‚àß (revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3' ‚à® s‚á©2' = s‚á©3')"
proof -
  have left_step: "revision_step r s‚á©1 s‚á©2" using s‚á©1_r s‚á©2 by auto 
  show ?thesis
  proof (use right in ‚Äπcases rule: revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
    case new: (new _ _ _ _ l)
    have l_fresh_left: "l ‚àâ LID‚á©G s‚á©2"
      by (rule only_new_introduces_lids'[OF left_step]) (simp add: s‚á©1_r new(3))+
    show ?thesis by (rule local_steps_commute) (use new l_fresh_left assms in auto)
  next
    case (fork _ _ _ _ r'')
    have r''_fresh_left: "r'' ‚àâ RID‚á©G s‚á©2"
      by (rule only_fork_introduces_rids'[OF left_step]) (simp add: s‚á©1_r fork(3))+
    show ?thesis by (rule local_and_fork_commute[OF s‚á©2 fork(1)]) (use fork neq s‚á©2 r''_fresh_left s‚á©1_r in auto)
  next
    case join
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_join, use join left_step right neq in auto)
  next
    case join‚á©Œµ
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_join‚á©Œµ, use join‚á©Œµ left_step right neq in auto)
  qed ((rule local_steps_commute[OF s‚á©2], use assms in auto)[1])+
qed

lemma SLC_ifTrue:
  assumes
    s‚á©1_r: "s‚á©1 r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Ite (VE (CV T)) e1 e2])" and
    s‚á©2: "s‚á©2 = s‚á©1(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[e1]))" and
    right: "revision_step r' s‚á©1 s‚á©2'" and
    neq: "r ‚â† r'"
  shows
    "‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß (revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3 ‚à® s‚á©2 = s‚á©3) ‚àß (revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3' ‚à® s‚á©2' = s‚á©3')"
proof -
  have left_step: "revision_step r s‚á©1 s‚á©2" using s‚á©1_r s‚á©2 by auto
  show ?thesis
  proof (use right in ‚Äπcases rule: revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
    case (new _ _ _ _ l)
    have l_fresh_left: "l ‚àâ LID‚á©G s‚á©2"
      by (rule only_new_introduces_lids'[OF left_step]) (simp add: s‚á©1_r new(3))+
    show ?thesis by (rule local_steps_commute) (use new l_fresh_left assms in auto)
  next
    case (fork _ _ _ _ r'')
    have r''_fresh_left: "r'' ‚àâ RID‚á©G s‚á©2"
      by (rule only_fork_introduces_rids'[OF left_step]) (simp add: s‚á©1_r fork(3))+
    show ?thesis by (rule local_and_fork_commute[OF s‚á©2 fork(1)]) (use fork neq s‚á©2 r''_fresh_left s‚á©1_r in auto)
  next
    case join
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_join, use join left_step right neq in auto)
  next
    case join‚á©Œµ
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_join‚á©Œµ, use join‚á©Œµ left_step right neq in auto)
  qed ((rule local_steps_commute[OF s‚á©2], use assms in auto)[1])+
qed

lemma SLC_ifFalse:
  assumes
    s‚á©1_r: "s‚á©1 r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Ite (VE (CV F)) e1 e2])" and
    s‚á©2: "s‚á©2 = s‚á©1(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[e2]))" and
    right: "revision_step r' s‚á©1 s‚á©2'" and
    neq: "r ‚â† r'"
  shows
    "‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß (revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3 ‚à® s‚á©2 = s‚á©3) ‚àß (revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3' ‚à® s‚á©2' = s‚á©3')"
proof -
  have left_step: "revision_step r s‚á©1 s‚á©2" using s‚á©1_r s‚á©2 by auto
  show ?thesis
  proof (use right in ‚Äπcases rule: revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
  next
    case (new _ _ _ _ l)
    have l_fresh_left: "l ‚àâ LID‚á©G s‚á©2" 
      by (rule only_new_introduces_lids'[OF left_step]) (simp add: s‚á©1_r new(3))+
    show ?thesis by (rule local_steps_commute) (use new l_fresh_left assms in auto)
  next
    case (fork _ _ _ _ r'')
    have r''_fresh_left: "r'' ‚àâ RID‚á©G s‚á©2"
      by (rule only_fork_introduces_rids'[OF left_step]) (simp add: s‚á©1_r fork(3))+
    show ?thesis by (rule local_and_fork_commute[OF s‚á©2 fork(1)]) (use fork neq s‚á©2 r''_fresh_left s‚á©1_r in auto)
  next
    case join
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_join, use join left_step right neq in auto)
  next
    case join‚á©Œµ
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_join‚á©Œµ, use join‚á©Œµ left_step right neq in auto)
  qed ((rule local_steps_commute[OF s‚á©2], use assms in auto)[1])+
qed

lemma SLC_set:
  assumes
    s‚á©1_r: "s‚á©1 r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Assign (VE (Loc l)) (VE v)])" and
    s‚á©2: "s‚á©2 = s‚á©1(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v), ‚Ñ∞[VE (CV Unit)]))" and
    side: "l ‚àà dom (œÉ;;œÑ)" and
    right: "revision_step r' s‚á©1 s‚á©2'" and
    neq: "r ‚â† r'"
  shows
    "‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß (revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3 ‚à® s‚á©2 = s‚á©3) ‚àß (revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3' ‚à® s‚á©2' = s‚á©3')"
proof -
  have left_step: "revision_step r s‚á©1 s‚á©2" using s‚á©1_r s‚á©2 side by auto
  show ?thesis
  proof (use right in ‚Äπcases rule: revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
    case (new _ _ _ _ l)
    have l_fresh_left: "l ‚àâ LID‚á©G s‚á©2"
      by (rule only_new_introduces_lids'[OF left_step]) (simp add: s‚á©1_r new(3))+
    show ?thesis by (rule local_steps_commute) (use new l_fresh_left assms in auto)
  next
    case (fork _ _ _ _ r'')
    have r''_fresh_left: "r'' ‚àâ RID‚á©G s‚á©2"
      by (rule only_fork_introduces_rids'[OF left_step]) (simp add: s‚á©1_r fork(3))+
    show ?thesis by (rule local_and_fork_commute[OF s‚á©2 fork(1)]) (use fork neq s‚á©2 r''_fresh_left s‚á©1_r side in auto)
  next
    case join
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_join, use join left_step neq in auto)
  next
    case join‚á©Œµ
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_join‚á©Œµ, use join‚á©Œµ left_step neq in auto)
  qed ((rule local_steps_commute[OF s‚á©2], use assms in auto)[1])+
qed

lemma SLC_get:
  assumes
    s‚á©1_r: "s‚á©1 r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [Read (VE (Loc l))])" and
    s‚á©2: "s‚á©2 = s‚á©1(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[VE (the ((œÉ;;œÑ) l))]))" and
    side: "l ‚àà dom (œÉ;;œÑ)" and
    right: "revision_step r' s‚á©1 s‚á©2'" and
    neq: "r ‚â† r'"
  shows
    "‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß (revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3 ‚à® s‚á©2 = s‚á©3) ‚àß (revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3' ‚à® s‚á©2' = s‚á©3')"
proof -
  have left_step: "revision_step r s‚á©1 s‚á©2" using s‚á©1_r s‚á©2 side by auto
  show ?thesis
  proof (use right in ‚Äπcases rule: revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
    case (new _ _ _ _ l)
    have l_fresh_left: "l ‚àâ LID‚á©G s‚á©2"
      by (rule only_new_introduces_lids'[OF left_step]) (simp add: s‚á©1_r new(3))+
    show ?thesis by (rule local_steps_commute) (use new l_fresh_left assms in auto)
  next
    case (fork _ _ _ _ r'')
    have r''_fresh_left: "r'' ‚àâ RID‚á©G s‚á©2"
      by (rule only_fork_introduces_rids'[OF left_step]) (simp add: s‚á©1_r fork(3))+
    show ?thesis by (rule local_and_fork_commute[OF s‚á©2 fork(1)]) (use fork neq s‚á©2 r''_fresh_left s‚á©1_r side in auto)
  next
    case join
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_join, use join left_step neq in auto)
  next
    case join‚á©Œµ
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_join‚á©Œµ, use join‚á©Œµ left_step neq in auto)
  qed ((rule local_steps_commute[OF s‚á©2], use assms in auto)[1])+
qed

subsubsection ‚ÄπCase new‚Ä∫

lemma SLC_new:
  assumes
    s‚á©1_r: "s‚á©1 r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[Ref (VE v)])" and
    s‚á©2: "s‚á©2 = s‚á©1(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v), ‚Ñ∞ [VE (Loc l)]))" and
    side: "l ‚àâ LID‚á©G s‚á©1" and
    right: "revision_step r' s‚á©1 s‚á©2'" and
    neq: "r ‚â† r'" and
    reach: "reachable (s‚á©1 :: ('r,'l,'v) global_state)" and
    lid_inf: "infinite (UNIV :: 'l set)"
  shows
    "‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß (revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3 ‚à® s‚á©2 = s‚á©3) ‚àß (revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3' ‚à® s‚á©2' = s‚á©3')"
proof -
  have left_step: "revision_step r s‚á©1 s‚á©2" using s‚á©1_r s‚á©2 side by auto
  show ?thesis
  proof (use right in ‚Äπcases rule: revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
    case app
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_app) (use app assms(1-5) in auto)
  next
    case ifTrue
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_ifTrue) (use ifTrue assms(1-5) in auto)
  next
    case ifFalse
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_ifFalse) (use ifFalse assms(1-5) in auto)
  next
    case (new œÉ' œÑ' ‚Ñ∞' v' l')
    have r'_unchanged_left: "s‚á©2 r' = s‚á©1 r'" using new(2) neq s‚á©2 by auto
    have r_unchanged_right: "s‚á©2' r = s‚á©1 r" by (simp add: new(1) neq s‚á©1_r)
    show ?thesis
    proof (cases "l = l'")
      case True
      obtain l'' where l''_fresh_left: "l'' ‚àâ LID‚á©G s‚á©2"
        by (meson ex_new_if_finite left_step lid_inf reach RID‚á©L_finite_invariant reachable_imp_identifiers_finite(2))
      hence l_l'': "l ‚â† l''" by (auto simp add: s‚á©2)
      have l''_fresh_s‚á©1: "l'' ‚àâ LID‚á©G s‚á©1" using assms True new l''_fresh_left by (auto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional)
      hence l''_fresh_right': "l'' ‚àâ LID‚á©G s‚á©2'" using True l_l'' new(1-2) by auto
      let "?Œ≤" = "id(l := l'', l'' := l)" 
      have bij_Œ≤: "bij ?Œ≤" by (simp add: swap_bij)
      let "?s‚á©3" = "s‚á©2(r' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ', œÑ'(l'' ‚Ü¶ v'), ‚Ñ∞' [VE (Loc l'')]))"
      have left_convergence: "revision_step r' s‚á©2 ?s‚á©3"
        using l''_fresh_left new(2) r'_unchanged_left by auto
      let "?s‚á©3'" = "s‚á©2'(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ(l'' ‚Ü¶ v), ‚Ñ∞ [VE (Loc l'')]))"
      have right_convergence: "revision_step r s‚á©2' ?s‚á©3'"
        using l''_fresh_right' new(1) neq s‚á©1_r by auto 
      have equiv: "?s‚á©3 ‚âà ?s‚á©3'"
      proof (rule eq_statesI[of id ?Œ≤])
        show "‚Ñõ‚á©G id ?Œ≤ ?s‚á©3 = ?s‚á©3'"
        proof -
          have s‚á©1: "‚Ñõ‚á©G id ?Œ≤ s‚á©1 = s‚á©1" using l''_fresh_s‚á©1 side by auto
          have œÉ: "‚Ñõ‚á©S id ?Œ≤ œÉ = œÉ" using l''_fresh_s‚á©1 s‚á©1_r side by auto
          have ‚Ñ∞: "‚Ñõ‚á©C id ?Œ≤ ‚Ñ∞ = ‚Ñ∞"
          proof
            show "l ‚àâ LID‚á©C ‚Ñ∞" using s‚á©1_r side by auto
            show "l'' ‚àâ LID‚á©C ‚Ñ∞" using l''_fresh_left s‚á©2 by auto
          qed
          have œÑlv: "‚Ñõ‚á©S id (id(l := l'', l'' := l)) (œÑ(l ‚Ü¶ v)) = (œÑ(l'' ‚Ü¶ v))"
          proof -
            have œÑ: "‚Ñõ‚á©S id ?Œ≤ œÑ = œÑ" using l''_fresh_s‚á©1 s‚á©1_r side by auto
            have v: "‚Ñõ‚á©V id ?Œ≤ v = v"
            proof
              show "l ‚àâ LID‚á©V v" using s‚á©1_r side by auto
              show "l'' ‚àâ LID‚á©V v" using l''_fresh_s‚á©1 s‚á©1_r by auto
            qed
            show ?thesis by (simp add: œÑ v bij_Œ≤)
          qed
          have œÉ': "‚Ñõ‚á©S id ?Œ≤ œÉ' = œÉ'" using l''_fresh_s‚á©1 new(2-3) by (auto simp add: True ID_distr_global_conditional)
          have ‚Ñ∞': "‚Ñõ‚á©C id ?Œ≤ ‚Ñ∞' = ‚Ñ∞'" using l''_fresh_s‚á©1 new(2-3) by (auto simp add: True ID_distr_global_conditional)
          have œÑl''v: "‚Ñõ‚á©S id (id(l := l'', l'' := l)) (œÑ'(l'' ‚Ü¶ v')) = (œÑ'(l ‚Ü¶ v'))"
          proof -
            have œÑ': "‚Ñõ‚á©S id ?Œ≤ œÑ' = œÑ'" using new(2-3) l''_fresh_s‚á©1 by (auto simp add: True ID_distr_global_conditional)
            have v': "‚Ñõ‚á©V id ?Œ≤ v' = v'" using new(2-3) l''_fresh_s‚á©1 by (auto simp add: True ID_distr_global_conditional)
            show ?thesis by (simp add: œÑ' v' bij_Œ≤)
          qed
          show ?thesis using True neq s‚á©1 œÉ ‚Ñ∞ œÑlv œÉ' ‚Ñ∞' œÑl''v s‚á©2 l_l'' new(1) by auto
        qed
      qed (simp add: bij_Œ≤)+
      show ?thesis using left_convergence right_convergence equiv by blast
    next
      case False
      have l_fresh_left: "l ‚àâ LID‚á©G s‚á©2'" 
        by (rule revision_stepE[OF left_step]) (use False side new(1-2) in ‚Äπauto simp add: s‚á©1_r‚Ä∫)
      have l'_fresh_right: "l' ‚àâ LID‚á©G s‚á©2" 
        by (rule revision_stepE[OF right]) (use False new(3) assms(1-3) in ‚Äπauto simp add: new(2)‚Ä∫)
      show ?thesis by (rule local_steps_commute[OF s‚á©2 new(1)]) (use new assms l_fresh_left l'_fresh_right s‚á©2 in auto)
    qed
  next
    case get
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_get) (use get assms(1-5) in auto)
  next
    case set
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_set) (use set assms(1-5) in auto)
  next
    case (fork _ _ _ _ r'')
    have r''_fresh_left: "r'' ‚àâ RID‚á©G s‚á©2" 
      by (rule only_fork_introduces_rids'[OF left_step]) (simp add: s‚á©1_r fork(3))+
    have l_fresh_right: "l ‚àâ LID‚á©G s‚á©2'" 
      by (rule only_new_introduces_lids'[OF right]) (simp add: side fork(2))+
    show ?thesis by (rule local_and_fork_commute[OF s‚á©2 fork(1)]) (use fork(1-2) neq s‚á©2 l_fresh_right r''_fresh_left s‚á©1_r in auto)
  next
    case join
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_join, use join left_step neq in auto)
  next
    case join‚á©Œµ
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_join‚á©Œµ, use join‚á©Œµ left_step neq in auto)
  qed
qed

subsubsection ‚ÄπCase fork‚Ä∫

lemma SLC_fork:
  assumes
    s‚á©1_r: "s‚á©1 r = Some (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [Rfork e])" and
    s‚á©2: "s‚á©2 = (s‚á©1(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[VE (Rid left_forkee)]), left_forkee ‚Ü¶ (œÉ;;œÑ, Œµ, e)))" and
    side: "left_forkee ‚àâ RID‚á©G s‚á©1" and
    right: "revision_step r' s‚á©1 s‚á©2'" and
    neq: "r ‚â† r'" and
    reach: "reachable (s‚á©1 :: ('r,'l,'v) global_state)" and
    rid_inf: "infinite (UNIV :: 'r set)"
  shows
    "‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß (revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3 ‚à® s‚á©2 = s‚á©3) ‚àß (revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3' ‚à® s‚á©2' = s‚á©3')"
proof -
  have left_step: "revision_step r s‚á©1 s‚á©2" using s‚á©1_r s‚á©2 side by (auto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional)
  show ?thesis
  proof (use right in ‚Äπcases rule: revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
    case app
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_app) (use assms(1-5) app in ‚Äπauto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional‚Ä∫)
  next
    case ifTrue
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_ifTrue) (use assms(1-5) ifTrue in ‚Äπauto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional‚Ä∫)
  next
    case ifFalse
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_ifFalse) (use assms(1-5) ifFalse in ‚Äπauto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional‚Ä∫)
  next
    case (new _ _ _ _ l) (* symmetry is intentionally not exploited: this would require the lid_inf assumption *)
    have l_fresh_left: "l ‚àâ LID‚á©G s‚á©2"
      by (rule only_new_introduces_lids'[OF left_step]) (simp add: s‚á©1_r new(3))+
    have r''_fresh_right: "left_forkee ‚àâ RID‚á©G s‚á©2'"
      by (rule only_fork_introduces_rids'[OF right]) (simp add: side new(2))+
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule local_and_fork_commute[OF new(1) s‚á©2]) (use new(1-2) neq s‚á©1_r r''_fresh_right l_fresh_left s‚á©2 in auto)
  next
    case get
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_get) (use assms(1-5) get in ‚Äπauto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional‚Ä∫)
  next
    case set
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_set) (use assms(1-5) set in ‚Äπauto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional‚Ä∫)
  next
    case (fork œÉ' œÑ' ‚Ñ∞' e' right_forkee)
    have r'_unchanged_left: "s‚á©2 r' = s‚á©1 r'" using side fork(2) neq s‚á©2 by auto
    have r_unchanged_right: "s‚á©2' r = s‚á©1 r" using fork(1,3) neq s‚á©1_r by auto
    have "r ‚â† left_forkee" using s‚á©1_r side by auto
    have "r ‚â† right_forkee" using fork(3) s‚á©1_r by auto
    have "r' ‚â† left_forkee" using fork(2) side by auto
    have "r' ‚â† right_forkee" using fork(2) fork(3) by auto
    show ?thesis
    proof (cases "left_forkee = right_forkee")
      case True
      obtain r'' where r''_fresh_left: "r'' ‚àâ RID‚á©G s‚á©2"
        using RID‚á©G_finite_invariant ex_new_if_finite left_step reach reachable_imp_identifiers_finite(1) rid_inf by blast
      hence "r'' ‚â† left_forkee" using assms(2) by auto
      have "r'' ‚â† r" using r''_fresh_left s‚á©2 by auto
      have "r'' ‚â† r'" using fork(2) r''_fresh_left r'_unchanged_left by auto
      have "r'' ‚àâ RID‚á©G (s‚á©1(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[VE (Rid left_forkee)])))"
        by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) RID‚á©G_def True UnI1 ‚Äπr ‚â† right_forkee‚Ä∫ domIff fun_upd_other fun_upd_triv in_restricted_global_in_updated_global(1) fork(3) r''_fresh_left s‚á©2)
      hence "r'' ‚àâ RID‚á©G (s‚á©1(r := None))" by blast
      have r''_fresh_s‚á©1: "r'' ‚àâ RID‚á©G s‚á©1" 
        using ‚Äπr ‚â† left_forkee‚Ä∫ s‚á©2 r''_fresh_left s‚á©1_r ‚Äπr'' ‚â† r‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr'' ‚àâ RID‚á©G (s‚á©1(r := None))‚Ä∫
        by (auto simp add: ID_distr_global_conditional)
      have r''_fresh_right: "r'' ‚àâ RID‚á©G s‚á©2'"
        using True ‚Äπr'' ‚â† left_forkee‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr' ‚â† right_forkee‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr'' ‚â† r'‚Ä∫ r''_fresh_s‚á©1 fork(2) r''_fresh_s‚á©1 
        by (auto simp add: fork(1) ID_distr_global_conditional fun_upd_twist)
      let ?Œ± = "id(left_forkee := r'', r'' := left_forkee)"
      have bij_Œ±: "bij ?Œ±" by (simp add: swap_bij)
      let "?s‚á©3" = "s‚á©2(r' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ', œÑ', ‚Ñ∞' [VE (Rid r'')]), r'' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ';;œÑ', Œµ, e'))"
      have left_convergence: "revision_step r' s‚á©2 ?s‚á©3"
        using fork(2) r''_fresh_left r'_unchanged_left revision_step.fork by auto
      let "?s‚á©3'" = "s‚á©2'(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞[VE (Rid r'')]), r'' ‚Ü¶ (œÉ;;œÑ, Œµ, e))"
      have right_convergence: "revision_step r s‚á©2' ?s‚á©3'"
        using r''_fresh_right r_unchanged_right revision_step.fork s‚á©1_r by auto
      have equiv: "?s‚á©3 ‚âà ?s‚á©3'"
      proof (rule eq_statesI[of ?Œ± id])
        show "‚Ñõ‚á©G ?Œ± id ?s‚á©3 = ?s‚á©3'"
        proof -
          have s‚á©1: "‚Ñõ‚á©G ?Œ± id s‚á©1 = s‚á©1" using r''_fresh_s‚á©1 side by auto
          have œÉ: "‚Ñõ‚á©S ?Œ± id œÉ = œÉ" using r''_fresh_s‚á©1 s‚á©1_r True fork(3) by auto
          have œÑ: "‚Ñõ‚á©S ?Œ± id œÑ = œÑ" using r''_fresh_s‚á©1 s‚á©1_r True fork(3) by auto
          have ‚Ñ∞: "‚Ñõ‚á©C ?Œ± id ‚Ñ∞ = ‚Ñ∞"
          proof
            show "left_forkee ‚àâ RID‚á©C ‚Ñ∞" using s‚á©1_r side by auto
            show "r'' ‚àâ RID‚á©C ‚Ñ∞" using True ‚Äπr ‚â† right_forkee‚Ä∫ r''_fresh_left s‚á©2 by auto
          qed
          have e: "‚Ñõ‚á©E ?Œ± id e = e"
          proof
            show "left_forkee ‚àâ RID‚á©E e" using s‚á©1_r side by auto
            show "r'' ‚àâ RID‚á©E e" using True ‚Äπr ‚â† right_forkee‚Ä∫ r''_fresh_left s‚á©2 by auto
          qed
          have œÉ': "‚Ñõ‚á©S ?Œ± id œÉ' = œÉ'" using fork(2) r''_fresh_s‚á©1 side by auto
          have œÑ': "‚Ñõ‚á©S ?Œ± id œÑ' = œÑ'" using fork(2) r''_fresh_s‚á©1 side by auto
          have ‚Ñ∞': "‚Ñõ‚á©C ?Œ± id ‚Ñ∞' = ‚Ñ∞'"
          proof 
            show "left_forkee ‚àâ RID‚á©C ‚Ñ∞'" using fork(2) side by auto
            show "r'' ‚àâ RID‚á©C ‚Ñ∞'" using fork(2) r''_fresh_s‚á©1 by auto
          qed
          have e': "‚Ñõ‚á©E ?Œ± id e' = e'"
          proof 
            show "left_forkee ‚àâ RID‚á©E e'" using fork(2) side by auto
            show "r'' ‚àâ RID‚á©E e'" using fork(2) r''_fresh_s‚á©1 by auto
          qed
          show ?thesis using True fork(1) neq œÉ œÑ ‚Ñ∞ e  œÉ' œÑ' ‚Ñ∞' e' s‚á©1 s‚á©2
            bij_Œ± ‚Äπr'' ‚â† left_forkee‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr' ‚â† left_forkee‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr ‚â† left_forkee‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr'' ‚â† r‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr'' ‚â† r'‚Ä∫ 
            by auto
        qed
      qed (simp add: bij_Œ±)+
      show ?thesis using equiv left_convergence right_convergence by blast
    next
      case False
      have right_forkee_fresh_left: "right_forkee ‚àâ RID‚á©G s‚á©2" 
        using False ‚Äπr ‚â† left_forkee‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr ‚â† right_forkee‚Ä∫ fork(3) s‚á©1_r 
        by (auto simp add: s‚á©2 ID_distr_global_conditional, auto)
      have left_forkee_fresh_right: "left_forkee ‚àâ RID‚á©G s‚á©2'" 
        using False ‚Äπr' ‚â† right_forkee‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr' ‚â† left_forkee‚Ä∫ side fork(2)
        by (auto simp add: fork(1) ID_distr_global_conditional fun_upd_twist)
      show ?thesis 
      proof(rule exI[where x="s‚á©2(r' := s‚á©2' r', right_forkee := s‚á©2' right_forkee)"],
            rule exI[where x="s‚á©2'(r := s‚á©2 r, left_forkee := s‚á©2 left_forkee)"],
            rule SLC_commute)
        show "s‚á©2(r' := s‚á©2' r', right_forkee := s‚á©2' right_forkee) = s‚á©2'(r := s‚á©2 r, left_forkee := s‚á©2 left_forkee)"
          using False ‚Äπr ‚â† right_forkee‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr' ‚â† left_forkee‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr' ‚â† right_forkee‚Ä∫ fork(1) neq s‚á©2 by auto
        show "revision_step r' s‚á©2 (s‚á©2(r' := s‚á©2' r', right_forkee := s‚á©2' right_forkee))"
          using fork(1-2) r'_unchanged_left revision_step.fork right_forkee_fresh_left by auto
        show "revision_step r s‚á©2' (s‚á©2'(r := s‚á©2 r, left_forkee := s‚á©2 left_forkee))"
          using left_forkee_fresh_right r_unchanged_right revision_step.fork s‚á©1_r s‚á©2 by auto
      qed
    qed
  next
    case join
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_join, use join left_step assms(3-5) in auto)
  next
    case join‚á©Œµ
    show ?thesis by (rule SLC_sym, rule SLC_join‚á©Œµ, use join‚á©Œµ left_step assms(3-5) in auto)
  qed
qed

subsubsection ‚ÄπThe theorem‚Ä∫

theorem strong_local_confluence:
  assumes 
    l: "revision_step r s‚á©1 s‚á©2" and
    r: "revision_step r' s‚á©1 s‚á©2'" and
    reach: "reachable (s‚á©1 :: ('r,'l,'v) global_state)" and
    lid_inf: "infinite (UNIV :: 'l set)" and
    rid_inf: "infinite (UNIV :: 'r set)"
  shows
    "‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß (revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3 ‚à® s‚á©2 = s‚á©3) ‚àß (revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3' ‚à® s‚á©2' = s‚á©3')"
proof (cases "r = r'")
  case True
  thus ?thesis by (metis l local_determinism r)
next
  case neq: False
  thus ?thesis by (cases rule: revision_stepE[OF l]) (auto simp add: assms SLC_app SLC_ifTrue
    SLC_ifFalse SLC_new SLC_get SLC_set SLC_fork SLC_join SLC_join‚á©Œµ)
qed

subsection ‚ÄπDiagram Tiling‚Ä∫

subsubsection ‚ÄπStrong local confluence diagrams‚Ä∫

lemma SLC:
  assumes
    s‚á©1s‚á©2: "s‚á©1 ‚Üù s‚á©2" and
    s‚á©1s‚á©2': "s‚á©1 ‚Üù s‚á©2'" and
    reach: "reachable (s‚á©1 :: ('r,'l,'v) global_state)" and
    lid_inf: "infinite (UNIV :: 'l set)" and
    rid_inf: "infinite (UNIV :: 'r set)"
  shows
    "‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß s‚á©2 ‚Üù‚áß= s‚á©3 ‚àß s‚á©2' ‚Üù‚áß= s‚á©3'"
proof -
  from s‚á©1s‚á©2 obtain r where l: "revision_step r s‚á©1 s‚á©2" by auto
  from s‚á©1s‚á©2' obtain r' where r: "revision_step r' s‚á©1 s‚á©2'" by auto
  obtain s‚á©3 s‚á©3' where 
    s‚á©3_eq_s‚á©3': "s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3'" and
    l_join: "revision_step r' s‚á©2 s‚á©3 ‚à® s‚á©2 = s‚á©3" and
    r_join: "revision_step r s‚á©2' s‚á©3' ‚à® s‚á©2' = s‚á©3'"
    using l r reach lid_inf rid_inf strong_local_confluence by metis
  have s‚á©2s‚á©3: "s‚á©2 ‚Üù‚áß= s‚á©3" using l_join steps_def by auto
  have s‚á©2's‚á©3: "s‚á©2' ‚Üù‚áß= s‚á©3'" using r_join steps_def by auto
  show ?thesis using s‚á©2's‚á©3 s‚á©2s‚á©3 s‚á©3_eq_s‚á©3' by blast
qed

lemma SLC_top_relaxed:
  assumes
    s‚á©1s‚á©2: "s‚á©1 ‚Üù‚áß= s‚á©2" and
    s‚á©1s‚á©2': "s‚á©1 ‚Üù s‚á©2'" and
    reach: "reachable (s‚á©1 :: ('r,'l,'v) global_state)" and
    lid_inf: "infinite (UNIV :: 'l set)" and
    rid_inf: "infinite (UNIV :: 'r set)"
  shows
    "‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß s‚á©2 ‚Üù‚áß= s‚á©3 ‚àß s‚á©2' ‚Üù‚áß= s‚á©3'"
proof -
  have 1: "s‚á©1 ‚Üù s‚á©2 ‚üπ s‚á©1 ‚Üù s‚á©2' ‚üπ ?thesis" using SLC lid_inf reach rid_inf by blast
  have 2: "s‚á©1 = s‚á©2 ‚üπ s‚á©1 ‚Üù s‚á©2' ‚üπ ?thesis" 
    by (rule exI[where x="s‚á©2'"], rule exI[where x="s‚á©2'"]) (auto simp add: Œ±Œ≤_refl)
  show ?thesis using assms 1 2 by auto
qed

subsubsection ‚ÄπMimicking diagrams‚Ä∫

declare bind_eq_None_conv [simp]
declare bind_eq_Some_conv [simp]

lemma in_renamed_in_unlabelled_val: 
  "bij Œ± ‚üπ (Œ± r ‚àà RID‚á©V (‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v)) = (r ‚àà RID‚á©V v)"
  "bij Œ≤ ‚üπ (Œ≤ l ‚àà LID‚á©V (‚Ñõ‚á©V Œ± Œ≤ v)) = (l ‚àà LID‚á©V v)"
  by (auto simp add: bij_is_inj inj_image_mem_iff val.set_map(1-2))

lemma in_renamed_in_unlabelled_expr:
  "bij Œ± ‚üπ (Œ± r ‚àà RID‚á©E (‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ v)) = (r ‚àà RID‚á©E v)"
  "bij Œ≤ ‚üπ (Œ≤ l ‚àà LID‚á©E (‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ v)) = (l ‚àà LID‚á©E v)"
  by (auto simp add: bij_is_inj inj_image_mem_iff expr.set_map(1-2))

lemma in_renamed_in_unlabelled_store:
  assumes 
    bij_Œ±: "bij Œ±" and
    bij_Œ≤: "bij Œ≤"
  shows
    "(Œ± r ‚àà RID‚á©S (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ)) = (r ‚àà RID‚á©S œÉ)"
    "(Œ≤ l ‚àà LID‚á©S (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ)) = (l ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ)"
proof -
  show "(Œ± r ‚àà RID‚á©S (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ)) = (r ‚àà RID‚á©S œÉ)"
  proof (rule iffI)
    assume "Œ± r ‚àà RID‚á©S (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ)"
    thus "r ‚àà RID‚á©S œÉ"
    proof (rule RID‚á©SE)
      fix l v
      assume map: "‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ l = Some v" and Œ±r: "Œ± r ‚àà RID‚á©V v" 
      hence "œÉ (inv Œ≤ l) = Some (‚Ñõ‚á©V (inv Œ±) (inv Œ≤) v)"
        using bij_Œ± bij_Œ≤ by (auto simp add: bij_is_inj)
      have "r ‚àà RID‚á©V (‚Ñõ‚á©V (inv Œ±) (inv Œ≤) v)"
        using bij_Œ± bij_Œ≤ Œ±r map by (auto simp add: bij_is_inj in_renamed_in_unlabelled_val(1))
      show "r ‚àà RID‚á©S œÉ"
        using ‚ÄπœÉ (inv Œ≤ l) = Some (‚Ñõ‚á©V (inv Œ±) (inv Œ≤) v)‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr ‚àà RID‚á©V (‚Ñõ‚á©V (inv Œ±) (inv Œ≤) v)‚Ä∫ by blast
    qed
  next
    assume "r ‚àà RID‚á©S œÉ"
    thus "Œ± r ‚àà RID‚á©S (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ)" 
      by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) RID‚á©SE RID‚á©SI bij_Œ± bij_Œ≤ fun_upd_same fun_upd_triv 
      in_renamed_in_unlabelled_val(1) renaming_distr_store)
  qed
  show "(Œ≤ l ‚àà LID‚á©S (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ)) = (l ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ)"
  proof (rule iffI)
    assume "Œ≤ l ‚àà LID‚á©S (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ)"
    thus "l ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ"
    proof (rule LID‚á©SE)
      assume "Œ≤ l ‚àà dom (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ)"
      thus "l ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ" by (auto simp add: LID‚á©SI(1) bij_Œ≤ bijection.intro bijection.inv_left)
    next
      fix v l'
      assume "‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ l' = Some v" "Œ≤ l ‚àà LID‚á©V v"
      thus "l ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ" using bij_Œ≤ by (auto simp add: LID‚á©SI(2) in_renamed_in_unlabelled_val(2))
    qed
  next
    assume "l ‚àà LID‚á©S œÉ" 
    thus "Œ≤ l ‚àà LID‚á©S (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ)"
    proof (rule LID‚á©SE)
      assume "l ‚àà dom œÉ"
      hence "‚àÉœÉ' v. œÉ = (œÉ'(l ‚Ü¶ v))" by fastforce
      hence "Œ≤ l ‚àà dom (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ)" using bij_Œ≤ by auto
      thus "Œ≤ l ‚àà LID‚á©S (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ)" by auto
    next
      fix v l'
      assume "œÉ l' = Some v" and l_in_v: "l ‚àà LID‚á©V v"
      hence "‚àÉœÉ'. œÉ = (œÉ'(l' ‚Ü¶ v))" by force
      thus "Œ≤ l ‚àà LID‚á©S (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ)" 
        using l_in_v bij_Œ≤ by (auto simp add: LID‚á©SI(2) in_renamed_in_unlabelled_val(2))
    qed
  qed
qed

lemma in_renamed_in_unlabelled_local:
  assumes
    bij_Œ±: "bij Œ±" and
    bij_Œ≤: "bij Œ≤"
  shows
    "(Œ± r ‚àà RID‚á©L (‚Ñõ‚á©L Œ± Œ≤ ls)) = (r ‚àà RID‚á©L ls)"
    "(Œ≤ l ‚àà LID‚á©L (‚Ñõ‚á©L Œ± Œ≤ ls)) = (l ‚àà LID‚á©L ls)"
  by (cases ls, simp add: assms in_renamed_in_unlabelled_expr in_renamed_in_unlabelled_store)+

lemma in_renamed_in_unlabelled_global:
  assumes
    bij_Œ±: "bij Œ±" and
    bij_Œ≤: "bij Œ≤"
  shows
    "(Œ± r ‚àà RID‚á©G (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s)) = (r ‚àà RID‚á©G s)"
    "(Œ≤ l ‚àà LID‚á©G (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s)) = (l ‚àà LID‚á©G s)"
proof -
  show "(Œ± r ‚àà RID‚á©G (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s)) = (r ‚àà RID‚á©G s)"
  proof (rule iffI)
    assume "Œ± r ‚àà RID‚á©G (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s)"
    thus "r ‚àà RID‚á©G s" 
    proof (rule RID‚á©GE)
      assume "Œ± r ‚àà dom (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s)"
      hence "r ‚àà dom s" by (metis bij_Œ± domIff fun_upd_same fun_upd_triv renaming_distr_global(2))
      thus "r ‚àà RID‚á©G s" by auto
    next
      fix r' ls
      assume ‚Ñõsr': "‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s r' = Some ls" and Œ±r: "Œ± r ‚àà RID‚á©L ls"
      have s_inv_Œ±r': "s (inv Œ± r') = Some (‚Ñõ‚á©L (inv Œ±) (inv Œ≤) ls)"
      proof -
        have "inv Œ± r' ‚àà dom s" using ‚Ñõsr' by auto
        then obtain ls' where s_inv_Œ±r: "s (inv Œ± r') = Some ls'" by blast
        hence "‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s r' = Some (‚Ñõ‚á©L Œ± Œ≤ ls')" by simp
        hence "ls = (‚Ñõ‚á©L Œ± Œ≤ ls')" using ‚Ñõsr' by auto
        thus ?thesis by (metis ‚Ñõ‚á©L_inv s_inv_Œ±r bij_Œ± bij_Œ≤)
      qed
      have r_in: "r ‚àà RID‚á©L (‚Ñõ‚á©L (inv Œ±) (inv Œ≤) ls)"
        by (metis bij_Œ± bij_Œ≤ bij_imp_bij_inv bijection.intro bijection.inv_left in_renamed_in_unlabelled_local(1) Œ±r)
      show "r ‚àà RID‚á©G s"
        using r_in s_inv_Œ±r' by blast
    qed
  next
    assume "r ‚àà RID‚á©G s"
    thus "Œ± r ‚àà RID‚á©G (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s)"
    proof (rule RID‚á©GE)
      assume "r ‚àà dom s"
      hence "Œ± r ‚àà dom (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s)"
        by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) bij_Œ± domD domI fun_upd_same fun_upd_triv renaming_distr_global(1))
      thus "Œ± r ‚àà RID‚á©G (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s)" by auto
    next
      fix r' ls
      assume "s r' = Some ls" "r ‚àà RID‚á©L ls"
      thus "Œ± r ‚àà RID‚á©G (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s)"
        by (metis ID_distr_global(1) UnI2 bij_Œ± bij_Œ≤ fun_upd_triv in_renamed_in_unlabelled_local(1) insertI2 renaming_distr_global(1))
    qed
  qed
  show "(Œ≤ l ‚àà LID‚á©G (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s)) = (l ‚àà LID‚á©G s)"
  proof (rule iffI)
    assume "Œ≤ l ‚àà LID‚á©G (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s)"
    from this obtain r ls where Rs_ls: "‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s r = Some ls" and Œ≤l_in_ls: "Œ≤ l ‚àà LID‚á©L ls" by blast
    hence "l ‚àà LID‚á©L (‚Ñõ‚á©L (inv Œ±) (inv Œ≤) ls)"
      by (metis bij_Œ± bij_Œ≤ bij_imp_bij_inv bijection.intro bijection.inv_left in_renamed_in_unlabelled_local(2))
    hence "l ‚àà LID‚á©G (‚Ñõ‚á©G (inv Œ±) (inv Œ≤) (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s))"
      by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) LID‚á©GI Rs_ls bij_Œ± bij_imp_bij_inv fun_upd_idem_iff renaming_distr_global(1))
    thus "l ‚àà LID‚á©G s" using bij_Œ± bij_Œ≤ by (metis ‚Ñõ‚á©G_inv)
  next
    assume "l ‚àà LID‚á©G s"
    then obtain r s' ls where "s = (s'(r ‚Ü¶ ls))" "l ‚àà LID‚á©L ls" by (metis LID‚á©GE fun_upd_triv)
    thus "Œ≤ l ‚àà LID‚á©G (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s)" by (simp add: bij_Œ± bij_Œ≤ in_renamed_in_unlabelled_local(2))
  qed
qed

lemma mimicking:
  assumes
    step: "revision_step r s s'" and
    bij_Œ±: "bij Œ±" and
    bij_Œ≤: "bij Œ≤"
  shows "revision_step (Œ± r) (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s) (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s')"
proof (use step in ‚Äπcases rule: revision_stepE‚Ä∫)
  case app
  then show ?thesis by (auto simp add: bij_Œ± bij_Œ≤ bijection.intro bijection.inv_left renaming_distr_subst)
next
  case (new _ _ _ _ l)
  have Œ≤l_fresh: "Œ≤ l ‚àâ LID‚á©G (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s)"
    by (simp add: bij_Œ± bij_Œ≤ in_renamed_in_unlabelled_global(2) new(3))
  show ?thesis using Œ≤l_fresh new by (auto simp add: bij_Œ± bij_Œ≤ bijection.intro bijection.inv_left)   
next
  case (fork œÉ œÑ ‚Ñ∞ e r')
  have Œ±r'_fresh: "Œ± r' ‚àâ RID‚á©G (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s)"
    by (simp add: bij_Œ± bij_Œ≤ in_renamed_in_unlabelled_global(1) fork(3))
  have s_r_as_upd: "s = (s(r ‚Ü¶ (œÉ, œÑ, ‚Ñ∞ [Rfork e])))" using fork(2) by auto
  have src: "‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s (Œ± r) = Some (‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÉ, ‚Ñõ‚á©S Œ± Œ≤ œÑ, (‚Ñõ‚á©C Œ± Œ≤ ‚Ñ∞) [Rfork (‚Ñõ‚á©E Œ± Œ≤ e)])" 
    by (subst s_r_as_upd, simp add: bij_Œ±)
  show ?thesis using Œ±r'_fresh src revision_step.fork fork(1) bij_Œ± by auto
qed (auto simp add: bij_Œ± bij_Œ≤ bijection.intro bijection.inv_left)

lemma mimic_single_step:
  assumes
    s‚á©1s‚á©1': "s‚á©1 ‚âà s‚á©1'" and
    s‚á©1s‚á©2: "s‚á©1 ‚Üù s‚á©2"
  shows "‚àÉs‚á©2'. (s‚á©2 ‚âà s‚á©2') ‚àß s‚á©1' ‚Üù s‚á©2'"
proof -
  from s‚á©1s‚á©1' obtain Œ± Œ≤ where 
    bij_Œ±: "bij Œ±" and 
    bij_Œ≤: "bij Œ≤" and
    R: "‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s‚á©1 = s‚á©1'" by blast
  from s‚á©1s‚á©2 obtain r where step: "revision_step r s‚á©1 s‚á©2" by auto
  have mirrored_step: "revision_step (Œ± r) s‚á©1' (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s‚á©2)" 
    using R bij_Œ± bij_Œ≤ step mimicking by auto
  have eq: "s‚á©2 ‚âà (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s‚á©2)" using bij_Œ± bij_Œ≤ by blast
  have s‚á©1's‚á©2': "s‚á©1' ‚Üù (‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s‚á©2)" using mirrored_step by auto
  from eq s‚á©1's‚á©2' show ?thesis by blast
qed

lemma mimic_trans:
  assumes
    s‚á©1_eq_s‚á©1': "s‚á©1 ‚âà s‚á©1'" and
    s‚á©1s‚á©2: "s‚á©1 ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©2"
  shows "‚àÉs‚á©2'. s‚á©2 ‚âà s‚á©2' ‚àß s‚á©1' ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©2'"
proof -
  from s‚á©1_eq_s‚á©1' obtain Œ± Œ≤ where
    bij_Œ±: "bij Œ±" and
    bij_Œ≤: "bij Œ≤" and
    R: "‚Ñõ‚á©G Œ± Œ≤ s‚á©1 = s‚á©1'"
    by blast
  from s‚á©1s‚á©2 obtain n where "(s‚á©1,s‚á©2) ‚àà [‚Üù]^^n" using rtrancl_power by blast
  thus ?thesis
  proof (induct n arbitrary: s‚á©2)
    case 0
    thus ?case using s‚á©1_eq_s‚á©1' by auto
  next
    case (Suc n)
    obtain x where n_steps: "(s‚á©1, x) ‚àà [‚Üù]^^n" and step: "x ‚Üù s‚á©2" using Suc.prems by auto
    obtain x' where x_eq_x': "x ‚âà x'" and s‚á©1'x: "s‚á©1' ‚Üù‚áß* x'" using Suc.hyps n_steps by blast
    obtain s‚á©2' where s‚á©2_eq_s‚á©2': "s‚á©2 ‚âà s‚á©2'" and x's‚á©2': "x' ‚Üù s‚á©2'" 
      by (meson step mimic_single_step x_eq_x')
    show ?case using s‚á©1'x s‚á©2_eq_s‚á©2' trancl_into_rtrancl x's‚á©2' by auto
  qed
qed

subsubsection ‚ÄπStrip diagram‚Ä∫

lemma strip_lemma:
  assumes
    s‚á©1s‚á©2: "s‚á©1 ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©2" and
    s‚á©1s‚á©2': "s‚á©1 ‚Üù‚áß= s‚á©2'" and
    reach: "reachable (s‚á©1 :: ('r,'l,'v) global_state)" and
    lid_inf: "infinite (UNIV :: 'l set)" and
    rid_inf: "infinite (UNIV :: 'r set)"
  shows "‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß s‚á©2 ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©3 ‚àß s‚á©2' ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©3'"
proof -
  from s‚á©1s‚á©2 obtain n where "(s‚á©1, s‚á©2) ‚àà [‚Üù]^^n" using rtrancl_power by blast
  from reach s‚á©1s‚á©2' and this show ?thesis
  proof (induct n arbitrary: s‚á©1 s‚á©2 s‚á©2')
    case 0
    hence "s‚á©1 = s‚á©2" by simp
    hence s‚á©2s‚á©2': "s‚á©2 ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©2'" using "0.prems"(2) by blast
    show ?case by (rule exI[where x=s‚á©2'], rule exI[where x=s‚á©2']) (use s‚á©2s‚á©2' in ‚Äπsimp add: Œ±Œ≤_refl‚Ä∫)
  next
    case (Suc n)
    obtain a where s‚á©1a: "s‚á©1 ‚Üù a" and as‚á©2: "(a, s‚á©2) ‚àà [‚Üù]^^n" by (meson Suc.prems(3) relpow_Suc_D2)
    obtain b c where "b ‚âà c" "a ‚Üù‚áß= b" "s‚á©2' ‚Üù‚áß= c"
      by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) SLC_top_relaxed Suc.prems(1) Suc.prems(2) Œ±Œ≤_sym lid_inf rid_inf s‚á©1a)
    obtain d e where "d ‚âà e" "s‚á©2 ‚Üù‚áß* d" "b ‚Üù‚áß* e"
      by (meson Suc.hyps Suc.prems(1) ‚Äπa ‚Üù‚áß= b‚Ä∫ as‚á©2 reachability_closed_under_execution_step s‚á©1a valid_stepE)
    obtain f where "c ‚Üù‚áß* f" "e ‚âà f"
      by (meson  ‚Äπb ‚âà c‚Ä∫ ‚Äπb ‚Üù‚áß* e‚Ä∫ mimic_trans)
    have "d ‚âà f" using Œ±Œ≤_trans ‚Äπd ‚âà e‚Ä∫ ‚Äπe ‚âà f‚Ä∫ by auto
    then show ?case by (metis (no_types, lifting) ‚Äπc ‚Üù‚áß* f‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs‚á©2 ‚Üù‚áß* d‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs‚á©2' ‚Üù‚áß= c‚Ä∫ r_into_rtrancl rtrancl_reflcl rtrancl_trans)
  qed
qed

subsubsection ‚ÄπConfluence diagram‚Ä∫

lemma confluence_modulo_equivalence:
  assumes
    s‚á©1s‚á©2: "s‚á©1 ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©2" and
    s‚á©1s‚á©2': "s‚á©1' ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©2'" and
    equiv: "s‚á©1 ‚âà s‚á©1'" and
    reach: "reachable (s‚á©1 :: ('r,'l,'v) global_state)" and
    lid_inf: "infinite (UNIV :: 'l set)" and
    rid_inf: "infinite (UNIV :: 'r set)"
  shows "‚àÉs‚á©3 s‚á©3'. s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3' ‚àß s‚á©2 ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©3 ‚àß s‚á©2' ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©3'"
proof -
  obtain n where "(s‚á©1, s‚á©2) ‚àà [‚Üù]^^n" using s‚á©1s‚á©2 rtrancl_power by blast
  from reach equiv s‚á©1s‚á©2' and this show ?thesis
  proof (induct n arbitrary: s‚á©1 s‚á©1' s‚á©2 s‚á©2')
    case base: 0
    hence "s‚á©1 = s‚á©2" by simp
    obtain s‚á©2'' where "s‚á©1 ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©2''" "s‚á©2' ‚âà s‚á©2''"
      using Œ±Œ≤_sym base.prems(2,3) mimic_trans by blast
    have "s‚á©2 ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©2''" using ‚Äπs‚á©1 = s‚á©2‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs‚á©1 ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©2''‚Ä∫ by blast
    show ?case by (rule exI[where x=s‚á©2''], rule exI[where x=s‚á©2']) (auto simp add: Œ±Œ≤_sym ‚Äπs‚á©2 ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©2''‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs‚á©2' ‚âà s‚á©2''‚Ä∫)
  next
    case step: (Suc n)
    obtain a where s‚á©1a: "(s‚á©1, a) ‚àà [‚Üù]^^n" and as‚á©2: "a ‚Üù s‚á©2" using step.prems(4) by auto
    have "reachable a" using reachability_closed_under_execution relpow_imp_rtrancl s‚á©1a step.prems(1) by blast
    obtain b c where "a ‚Üù‚áß* b" "s‚á©2' ‚Üù‚áß* c" "b ‚âà c"
      using s‚á©1a step.hyps step.prems(1-3) by blast
    have "a ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©2" by (simp add: as‚á©2 r_into_rtrancl)
    obtain s‚á©3 d where "s‚á©3 ‚âà d" "s‚á©2 ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©3" "b ‚Üù‚áß* d" 
      by (meson Œ±Œ≤_sym ‚Äπa ‚Üù‚áß* b‚Ä∫ ‚Äπreachable a‚Ä∫ as‚á©2 lid_inf refl_rewritesI rid_inf strip_lemma)
    obtain s‚á©3' where "s‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3'" "c ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©3'"
      by (meson Œ±Œ≤_trans ‚Äπb ‚âà c‚Ä∫ ‚Äπb ‚Üù‚áß* d‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs‚á©3 ‚âà d‚Ä∫ mimic_trans)
    show ?case by (meson ‚Äπc ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©3'‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs‚á©2 ‚Üù‚áß* s‚á©3‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs‚á©2' ‚Üù‚áß* c‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs‚á©3 ‚âà s‚á©3'‚Ä∫ transD trans_rtrancl)
  qed
qed

subsection ‚ÄπDeterminacy‚Ä∫

theorem determinacy:
  assumes 
    prog_expr: "program_expr e" and
    e_terminates_in_s: "e ‚Üì s" and
    e_terminates_in_s': "e ‚Üì s'" and
    lid_inf: "infinite (UNIV :: 'l set)" and
    rid_inf: "infinite (UNIV :: 'r set)"
  shows "s ‚âà s'"
proof -
  obtain r where x: "(Œµ(r ‚Ü¶ (Œµ,Œµ,e))) ‚Üù‚áß* s"
    by (metis e_terminates_in_s execution_def maximal_execution_def terminates_in_def)
  obtain r' where y: "(Œµ(r' ‚Ü¶ (Œµ,Œµ,e))) ‚Üù‚áß* s'"
    by (metis e_terminates_in_s' execution_def maximal_execution_def terminates_in_def)
  let "?Œ±" = "id(r := r', r' := r)"
  have bij_Œ±: "bij ?Œ±" by (simp add: swap_bij)
  have equiv: "(Œµ(r ‚Ü¶ (Œµ,Œµ,e))) ‚âà (Œµ(r' ‚Ü¶ (Œµ,Œµ,e)))" 
  proof (rule eq_statesI[of ?Œ± id])
    show "‚Ñõ‚á©G ?Œ± id (Œµ(r ‚Ü¶ (Œµ, Œµ, e))) = Œµ(r' ‚Ü¶ (Œµ, Œµ, e))"
      using bij_Œ± prog_expr by auto
  qed (simp add: bij_Œ±)+
  have reach: "reachable (Œµ(r ‚Ü¶ (Œµ,Œµ,e)))" 
    by (simp add: initial_state_reachable prog_expr)
  have "‚àÉa b. (a ‚âà b) ‚àß s ‚Üù‚áß* a ‚àß s' ‚Üù‚áß* b"
    by (rule confluence_modulo_equivalence[OF x y equiv reach lid_inf rid_inf])
  from this obtain a b where "s ‚Üù‚áß* a" "s' ‚Üù‚áß* b" "a ‚âà b" by blast
  have "s = a" by (meson ‚Äπs ‚Üù‚áß* a‚Ä∫ e_terminates_in_s maximal_execution_def rtranclD terminates_in_def tranclD)
  have "s' = b" by (meson ‚Äπs' ‚Üù‚áß* b‚Ä∫ converse_rtranclE e_terminates_in_s' maximal_execution_def terminates_in_def)
  show ?thesis using ‚Äπa ‚âà b‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs = a‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs' = b‚Ä∫ by auto
qed

end (* substitution locale *)
